targetString: Qorannoon sanyii jalqabaa eddattoowwan dhukkubsataa Mudde 27, 2019 tti argamuu vaayirasii koroonaa SARS-fakkaatu agarsiise.

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: Yaadachiisi uummataa Komishinii Fayyaa Mana Qopheessaa Wuhaaniin Mudde 31 tti gadhiifame.

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: WHO’nis guyyaama walfakkaataatti ture kan odeeffannoo argate.

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: Akkuma yaadachiifne kunneen ta’aniin, dooktaroonni Wuhan waayee weerarichaa “odeeffannoo baballisuu” dhaan poolisootaan akeekkachiifamniiru.

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Koomishiniin Fayyaa Biyyoolessaa Chaayinootaa jalqabatti "ragaa ifaan" daddarbiinsa namaa-gara-namaa akka hin jirre dubbataniiru.

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: Xumura Amajjiitti, mootummaan Chaayinaa duula cimaa kan booda barreessaan olaanaan Paartii Kommunistii Shii Jiinpiingi “waraana ummataa” jedhaniin tatamsa’ina vaayirasichaa ittisuuf labse.

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: “Seenaa addunyaa irratti iddoo kunuunsa addaa guddaa” jedhamee kan ibsame, sararri ittisaa saaniteer imala keessaa fi alaa Wuhaan dhaabuuf Amajjii 23 labsame, akkasumas magaalota Hubei keessa jiran 15tti babaldhate, waliigalaan namoota miiliyoona 57 bira gaha.

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: Fayyadamni konkolaattota dhuunfaa magaalaa keessatti uggurameera.

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: Ayyaaneffannaan Waggaa Haaraa warra Chaayinaa (Amajjii 25) iddoowwan baay’eetti haqameera.

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: Abbootiin taayitaa ijaarsa hospitaalaa yeroo, Hospitaala Hooshenshaan, kan guyyaa 10 keessatti xumurame ifoomsan.

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: Hospitaalli kanbiraan ‘Leishenshan Hospital’, qabiinsa dhukkubsattoota dabalataaf ijaaramee ture.

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: Hospitaalota haaraa ijaaramanitti dabalataan, Chaayinaan Wuhan keessaa bakkeewwan tajaajilaa biroo 14 kanneen akka, giddu galawwan walga’ii fi isteediyeemotaa gara hospitaala yerootti jijjiirteetti. Amajjii gaafa 26, imaltootaaf labsiiwwan fayyaa kennuu fi Festivaala ayyaana Birraa dheeressuu dabalatee, weerara COVID-19 to’achuuf tarkaanfiiwwan biroo fudhateera.

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: Yuuniversiitileen fi manneen barnootaa biyyattiis cufamanii turan.

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
targetString: Naannoleen akka Hong Kong fi Macau keessattuu manneen barnootaa fi yuuniversiitiilee waliin walqabatee tarkaanfiilee hedduu fudhataniiru.

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: Naannolee Chaayinaa hedduu keessatti fageenyarraa hojjechuun jalqabee ture.

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: Dhorkaaleen imalaa Hubei keessaa fi alatti tumamanii turan.

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: Geejjibni ummataa fooyya’e, akkasumas muuziyeemiiwwan guutuu Chaayinaatti argaman yeroodhaaf cufaman.

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: To’annaan sosochii ummataa magaalota hedduu keesatti fudhatamee kan turee fi tilmaamaan namoonni miiliyoona 760tti siqan (walakkaa ummata biyyattiitii ol) dhorkaaleen mana alaa muraasni mudateera. Erga weerarichi Bitootessa keessa kan addunyaa ta’eetii, aanga’oonni Chaayinaa tarkaanfilee jajjaboo vaayiresicha biyyoota biroorraa akka hin galle ittisuuf fudhataniiru.

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, Beejiingi imaltoota addunyaa magaala seenan hundaaf dirqama turtii guyyoota 14 dirqama goote. Bitootessaa 23 irratti, giddugala Chaayinaatti guyyaa shan keessatti akka biyyaatti nama tokko qofatti darbe, haala kana keessatti imalaa Istaanbul Irraa gara Guwaanzuu deebu’een ture.

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: Bitootessa 24,2020, tatamsa’inni dhukkubaa kan biyya keessaa akka ugguramee fi weerarichi Chaayinaa keessatti akka too’atame Piriimiyer Li Keqiyang gabaase.

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: Guyyuma walfakkaataatti dhorkaaleen imalaa, qaama Wuhan kan taate Hubei keessatti uggura ji’oota lamaan booda laaffatanii turan. Ministeerri Dhimmoota Alaa Chaayinaa seensi viisaani ykn eyyeme jireenyaa warra qabanii Bitootessa 28 irraa kaasee akka dhaabbatu, imaammanni kun yoom akka dhumu ibsa dabalataa malee, gaafa Bitootessa 26, 2020 beeksiseera.

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: Warreen Chaayinaa seenuu barbaadan imbaasiiwwan yookaan qoontsilaawwan Chaayinaatii viisaa fudhachuu qabu.

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: Mootummaan Chaayinaa daldalootaa fi warshaalee Bitootessa 30 deebi’anii akka banaman jajjabeessaniiru, akkasumas dhaabbileef qarqaabaalee durgoo maallaqaa kennaniiru. Manni Maree Mootummaa dho’iinsa COVID-19 haaraa ittisuuf maatiiwwan fageenya hawaasaa eeggachuuf akka ta’utti kabaja isaa toora internaataan akka mullisan haa gaafatuyyuu malee, Manni maree biyyattii Bitootessa 4, 10:00 kan Festivaala Qingming waliin walirra bu’utti yeroo callisaa biyyaalessaa kan daqiiqaa-sadii labseera.

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: COVID-19 gaafa Amajjii 20, 2020 Chaayinaarraa gara Kooriyaa Kibbaatti akka faca’e ni mirkanaa’e.

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: Ejensiin fayyaa lammii daballii olaanaa dhukkubsattootaa Gurraandhala 20 gabaase, baldhinaan tuuta guddaa Deeguu warraaqsa amantii haaraa Mana Amantaa Shiinchoonjii Iyyasuus’tti tatamsa’e.

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: Hordoftoonni Shincheonji Wuhaan iddoo jalqaba shakkamaan weerarichaa itti argame irraa Daegu daawwatan

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: Hanga Gurraandhala 22 tti, hordoftoota mana sagadaa 9,336 keessaa, 1,261 yookaan 13% ta’an mallattoolee gabaasaniiru. Kooriyaan Kibbaa dammaqiinsa sadarkaa olaanaa Gurraandhala 23 2020tti labsiteetti.

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: Gurraadhala 28 irratti, Kooriyaatti dhukkubsattoota mirkanaa’an 2,000 oltu gabaafame, Gurraadhala 29 gara 3,150’tti ol guddate.

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: Iddoon ka’umsaa loltoota Kooriyaa Kibbaa erga loltoonni sadii vaayiresichaaf poosetiiva ta’anii booda adda baafamee ture.

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: Sagantaaleen daandiiwwan qilleensaas miidhamanii kan turanii fi kanaafuu jijjiramanii turan. Kooriyaan Kibbaa akka addunyaatti sagantaa guddaa fi sirnaan qindaa’e uummata hundaaf qorannoo vaayiresii gaggeessuun fi namoota hubaman adda baasuu akkasumas warreen isaan waliin tuttuqqii qaban faana dhahuu fi qofaa tursiisuu jalqabdee turte.

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: Maloonni sakattii kan dabalatu namoonni haaraan addunyaarra dhufanii mallattoo qaban karaalee appilikeeshinii moobayilaatiin dirqamaan of gabaasuu, wayita imalarra jiranitti vaayiresichaaf qoratamuun bu’aan guyyaa itti aanutti ba’uu fi dandeettii qorannoo dabaluun guyyootti haga namoota 20,000 akka qoratamuu danda’an gochuu faadha.

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Guutuu magaalaa addatti foo’uu dhabaatanis sagantaan Kooriyaa Kibbaa weerara too’achuu irratti milkaa’aa akka ta’etti fudhatame. Hawaasni Kooriyaa Kibbaa jalqabarra deebii balaa Pirezidaantiin Muun Jee’in kennan faallessaa turan.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: Kooriyaanonni hedduun Moon weeraricha sirnaan hin qabne, jechuun himannaaf waamicha gochuudhaan ykn deebiisaaf galateeffachuu irratti mallattoo walitti qabaniiru.

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: Bitootessa 23, Kooriyaan Kibbaa torban afur keessatti dhukkubsataa guyyaa-tokkoo gadi aanaa akka qabdu gabaafame.

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 29, Eebla 1 irraa kaasee imaltoonni alaa torbeewwan lamaaf iddoo tursiisaa kan turan ta’uun gabaafamee ture.

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: Akka gabaasa miidiyaa Ebla 1’tti, Kooriyaan Kibbaa gaaffii gargaarsa qorannaa vaayirasii biyyoota garaagaraa 121 irraa keessummeessite.

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: Iraan dhukkubsataa SARS-CoV-2 jalqabaa Qom’tti adda barame Gurraandhala 19 beeksifte, kan, akkaataa Ministeera Fayyaa fi Barnoota Fayyaatti booda namoonni lama du’an.

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: Tarkaanfiiwwan jalqabaa mootummaan beeksifaman haqamuu qophiilee sirbaa fi taateewwan aadaa kan biroo, taateewwan ispoortii, akkasumas kadhannaawwan Jimaataa, akkasumas cufamuu yunivarsiitiiwwaniifi manneen barnootaa hammate.

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: Iraan vaayirasicha qolachuuf riyaala tiriiliyoona shan ramadde.

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: Pirezidaant Hassan Roohaaniin Guraandhala gaafa 26, 2020, iddoowwan weerarichaan hubaman qofaatti baasuuf karoorri akka hin turree fi namootani dhufni qofti akka qofaatti baafaman dubbatan.

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: Karoorri imala magaalota gidduu daangessuu kan ifoome Bitootessa keessa, yoo imalli guddaan magaalotaa bara haaraa Peershiyaa Noowruuz kan itti fufe ta’es.

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: Bakki waaqeffannaa Shia, Qom keessa jiru hanga Bitootessa 16, 2020 tti imaltoota alaaf banaa ta’ee tureera. Guraandhala keessa Iraan Chaayinaatti irraa fudhachuun giddu gala baballinaa vaayiresichaa taateetti.

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: Iraan keessatti weeraricha too’achuu keessatti, Gurraandhala 28’tti biyyoonni kudhanii ol dhukkubsattoota isaanii gara Iraanitti deebisan, kun kan agarsiisu hammi weerarichaa dhukkubsattoota 388 kanneen guyyaa sana mootummaa Iraaniin gabaafaman caala hammaachuu mala.

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: Paarlaamaan warra Iraan cufameera, miseensota 290 isaa keessaa 23 vaayirasichaaf gaafa Bitootessa 3 tti positiivii ta’uun isaanii gabaafamuu waliin.

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 12, ‘Human Rights Watch’ haalduree tokko malee falmattoota mirga namoomaa mormii naga qabeessaaf hidhaman akka gadlakkisuu fi hidhamtoota jiran hunda yeroof akka gadlakkisuu qabu yaaada dhiyeesseera.

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: Vaayirasichi dhaabbilee dhiheenya jiran kanneen akka, buufata ugguraa, kan yaala fayyaa gahaa hin qabne ni babal’atu sodaan jedhu akka jiru himee jira.

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 15, mootummaan Iraan erga weerarichaatii biyyattii keessatti isa olaanaa ta’e du’aatiilee 100 gabaaste.

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: Dhukkuba Bitootessa 17’tiin namoonni teessoo qaban yookaan namoonni siyaasaa Iraan yoo xiqqaate 12 ta’anii fi hoggantoonni mootummaa du’anii jiru.

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: Bitootessa 23, Iraan sababa vaayirasii koroonaatiif sa’aatii sa’aatiin dhukkubsattoota 50 fi daqiiqa kudhan kudhaniin du’a tokko keessummeessaa turte.

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: Akka hoggantoota Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’tti, dhukkubsattoonni Iraan keessa jiran kan jedhamee ol dachaa shan caaluu mala.

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: Qoqqobbiin U.S. Iraan irra keesse humna diinagdeen biyyattii weerara vaayirasichaa ittisuuf qabdu miidhaa jiraachuu akka malu gorfame.

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: UN tti Komishinarri Olaanaa Mirgoota Namoomaa uggurri diinagdee biyyoota baay’ee weerara addunyaawaan hubamaniif akka salphatuuf gaafatan, Iraan dabalatee.

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: Jalqabbichi Amajjii 31 tti Xaaliyaanitti faffaca’uun isaa mirkanaa’e, yeroo tuuristoonni Chaayinaa lama Roomaa keessatti SARS-CoV-2’f positiivii ta’anitti.

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: Dhimmooti hamma olaanaan dabaluu jalqabaniiru, kan mootummaa warra Xaaliyaan akka inni barrisuu xiyyaarotaa hunda Chaayinaattii fi irraa yeroof dhaabu akkasumas labsii yeroo hatattamaa labsuuf kakaase.

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: Qoodinsi dhukkubsataa COVID-19 kan walitti dhufeenya hin qabne booda adda bahe, dhukkubsattoota 16 Gurraandhala 21 Loombaardiitti mirkanaa’an irraa eegaluun. Gurraandhala 22’tti Manni Maree Ministeerotaa weerara ittisuuf seera ifoomse, bulchiinsota garaagaraa 11 Kaaba Xaaliyaanitti argaman keessaa namoota 50,000 ol adda foo’uu dabalatee.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: Muummeen Ministeeraa Juuseeppee Koonteen, “naannoolee weerarichaatti seensaa fi bahiinsi hin dhihaatu, jedhan.

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Naannolee kanneenitti yeroof tursiifamuun dalagaalee hojii fi ta’iilee ispoortii durayyuu ajajameera. “ Bitootessa 4, mootummaan Xaaliyaanii akkuma duuti Xaaliyaanii keessaa 100 ga’een cufaatii manneen barnootaa fi yuuniversiitiilee guutummaa biyyattii keessa jiraniif ajaja kenne.

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: Taateewwan ispoortii hangafoonni hundi, tapha kubbaa miilaa Serie A dabalatee, kan hanga Eblaatti cufaadhaan gaggeeffamuuf ture, garuu Bitootessa 9’tti, ispoortiin hundi yoo xiqqaate ji’a tokkoof dhaabbate.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: Bitootessa 11 tti, Muummichi Ministeeraa Koonteen sochii daldalaa hunda jedhamuun hamma danda’amuun madabbira guddaa shaqaxi keessatti gurguramuufi faarmaasiiwwan osoo hin dabalatin hojii yeroodhaaf addaan kutuu ajajeera. Bitootessa 6 tti, Koolleejjiin Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation fi Intensive Care (SIAARTI) Warra Xaaliyaan, yaadota naamusa wal’aansaa.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 19, weerarichaan du’aatii 3,405 erga gabaasteen booda addunyaarraa biyya du’aatiin koronaavaayiresiinii keessatti guddaa ta’e Chaayinaarraa fudhachuun taateetti.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Bitootessa 22, Raashiyaan meeshaalee fayyaa Xayyaarota lolaa sagal gara Xaaliyaanitti akka ergite gabaafame.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Akka Ebla 5’tti, Xaaliyaaniitti dhukkubsattoota 128,948, du’a 15,887, fi kanneen fayyan 21,815 tu ture, kanneen keessaa hedduun naannoo Loombaardiitti argamu.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: Gabaasi CNN walmakiinsi uummata maanguddoo guddaa Xaaliyaaniifi yeroodhaan namoota hunda vaayirasicha qaban qorachuu dadhabuun hamma dhukkubichaan du’uu olaanaadhaaf gumaachuu akka danda’u agarsiise.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Deebiin Yuunaayitid Kingdom vaayiresichaaf kenne jalqaba akka biyyoota miidhamanii dhiphinarraa walaba turan keessaa tokko ta’eetti mullatee kan turee fi hanga Bitootessa 18, 2020 tti, mootummaan Biritish gargar fageenya hawaasa bifa kamiiyyuu ykn qufaa tursiisuu namoota hedduu lammiilee isaarra hin keenye ture.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: Sababa kanaan, hanqina to’annoo mullatee fi cimina deebii rakkoolee hawaasa mudataniirratti komii irrate ka’e fudhateera. Bitootessa gaafa 16, Muummichi Ministeeraa Boris Johnson imalawwan barbaachisoo hin taane, fi tuttuqqii hawaasaa irratti namoonni yoo danda’amee manaa akka hojjetanii fi bakkeewwan wali ga’ii kanneen akka iddoowwan walitti qabama hawaasaa, restooraantii fi tiyaateroota akka dhiisan gan gorsu ibsa baasanii turan.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: Bitootessaa 20, wantoota nama haaromsan kanneen akka manneen dhugaatii fi jiimii hamma danda’ameen akka cufaman mootummaan ifoomse, akkasumas hojii dhabdummaa yeroo qaala’iinsaa hambisuuf hanga hojjattoota %80’tiif hanga daangaa yuuroo 2,500tti kaffaltii ji’aa raawwachuuf waadaa gale. Bitootessa 23, Muummeen Ministeeraa tarkanfii addaan fageenya hawaasaa, gurmuu namoota lamaa olii dhoorkuu fi imalaa fi sochii manaan alaa daangessu murteessaadha jedhamanii amanaman cimaa labsan.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Tarkaanfii duraa kan hin fakkaanne, qoqqobbiiwwan kunneen karaa dhimma nagaa fi gurmuu bittinsuutiin poolisiidhaan hojiirra oola.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: Daldalawwan harki caalaan akka cufamaniif ajajamaniiru, daldalawwan "barbaachisoo" jedhaman utuu hin dabalatin, madabbira guddaa shaqaxi keessatti gurguramu, faarmaasiiwwan, baankota, suuqiiwwan haardiweerii, bufatoota boba’aa, fi gaaraajiiwwan dabalatee.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: Amajjii gaafa 20, ta’iin COVID-19 jalqabaa Bulchiinsa Kaaba-Lixa Washington Paasifik keessatti namicha Wuhan irraa Amajjii gaafa 15 deebi’e irratti argamee ture.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: Humni Ittisa vaayirasii koroonaa Waayit Haawos Amajjii 29 hundaa’e.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: Amajjii gaafa 31, bulchiinsi Trump labsii yeroo hatattamaa fayyaa hawaasaa kan labsee fi seensa imaltoota Chaayinaa irraa dhufanii irratti dhorkaa kaa’eera.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: Amajjii 28, 2020 tti, Wiirtuun To’annoo Dhukkubaa dhaabbata fayyaa uummataa mootummaa U.S. dursaa ta’e — isaan meeshaa qorannoo mataa isaanii akka dagaagsan beeksise.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Kana hojjachuun alatti, Yuunaayitid Isteet jalqabbii qorannoo rincicaa qabaataa turte, kun yeroo sanitti dhugummaa weerarichaa hale ture.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: Hanga dhuma Guraandhalaatti meeshaalee qorannoo kan miti-mootummaaf (Dhaabbilee barnootaan, kaampaanotaan fi hospitaalotaan) hanqina mirkaneessaa mootummaa federaalaa , fi hanga jalqaba Bitootessaatti ulaagaalee danqoo namoonni qoratamuuf akka hin geenye taasisan (yeroo sanaa kaasee ajajni dookteraa barbaachiseera) tiin, qorannoon meeshaalee qorannoo ga’oomoo hin taane mootummaa federaalaatiin qophaa’een akkaan miidhamee ture .

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 27, ‘Washington Post’ qorannoowwan 4,000 gadi ta’an Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti godhamuu isaanii gabaasee ture.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 13, qorannoolee 14,000 gad akka raawwate ‘The Atlantic’ gabaaseera.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: Bitootessa 22 tti, ‘Associated Press’ kan gabaaase: “Namoonni hedduun mallattoolee qabanii fi ajajni dookteraa qorannoodhaaf sa'aatiiwwaniif ykn guyyootaaf eeganiiru.” Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessatti erga duuti jalqabaa bulchiinsa Washington keessatti gaafa Guraandhala 29 gabaafamee booda, Bulchaa Jay Inslee’n, gocha bulchiinsota biroonis hordofame, labsii yeroo hatattamaa labsani.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 3 manneen barnootaa naannoo Seattle dareen kan haqanii fi walakkeessa Bitootessaatti, guutummaa biyyattiitti manneen barnootaa cufamaa turan. Gaafa Bitootessa 6 2020, Yuunaayitid Isteetsi tilmaama miidhaa koronaavaayiresiin haaraan kun biyyattii irraan ga’urratti garee ipidimiyooloojistootaatiin ‘Imperial College of London’ keessatti gorsamaniiru.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: Guyyaa wal fakkaataatti Pirezidaantiin Tiraampi qophaa’ummaa fi ramaddii dhiheessa deebii vaayirasii koroonaa doolaara biiliyoona 8.3 baajata muddamaa dhaabbileen federaalaa weeraricha akka ittiin ittisaniif Ramadan mallatteessan.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Korporeeshinoonni dhorkaalee imalaa hojjettootaa kaa’aniiru, konfiraansota kan haqanii fi hojjettoonni manaa akka hojjetan jajjabeessaniiru.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: Ta’iileen ispoortii fi waqtiileen haqamaniiru. Bitootessa gaafa 11, Bitootessa 13 kaasee guyyoota 30maaf kan hojiirra oolu dhorkaa imalaa Yuunaayitid Kingidom irraan kan hafe biyyoota Awurrooppaa gara caalaan irra kaa’uu Trump dubbataniiru.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: Guyyaa itti aanu, ittisni gara Yuunaayitid Kiingidamii fi Ayerlaandi akka hammatu babal’ise.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 13, labsii yeroo hatattamaa biyyaalessaa labse, kunimmoo fandiileen federaalaa rakkooleef deebii kennuuf akka argaman taasiseera.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Bitootessa 15 irraa jalqabee, tatamsa’ina vaayiresichaa hir’isuuf guutummaa U.S. keessatti daldalli hedduun kan cufaman ykn yeroo hojii hir’isaniiru.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: Bitootessa 17 tti, weerarri iddoo murta’ee sun isteetota 50’n hunda keessaafi Aanaa Kolumbiyaa keessatti mirkanaa’eera. Bitootessa 23 tti, Magaalaan Niiw York dhimmoota vaayirasii koroonaa 10,700 akka qabdutu gabaafame, guutummaa lakkoofsa dhimmoota Kooriyaa Kibbaa keessa jiruun ol kan ta’e.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 25, Bulchaaan akkuma dachaan dabaluun ta’ii guyyoota 2.0 irraa gara guyyoota 4.7 tti hir’atee booda gargar fageenyi hawaasa waan hojjetaa jiru fakkaata jedhan.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 28’tti, Magaala Niwuu Yoorkitti namoota 32,308 dhukkubsatanii, fi 672 sababa vaayirasichaattiin du’antu ture. Bitootessa 26, Yuunaayitid Isteet Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaan dabalatee biyya addunyaa kamuu caala dhukkubsataa vaayirasii koroonaa qabaachuu gabaaste. Akka Ebla 8’tti Yuunaayitid Isteetitti dhukkubsattoota 400,335’tu galmaa’e, akkasumas namoota 12,841’tu du’e.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: Akka gabaasa miidiyaa Bitootessa 30tti, Pirezidaantiin U.S. Tiraampi qajeelfama adda fageenya hawaasaa hanga Ebla 30 turu murteessan.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: Guyyuma walfakkaataatt, ‘USNS Comfort’ dooniin hospitaalaa siree 1000 qabu, Niw Yoork keessatti ni hundeeffame.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Ebla 3 tti, U.S. sababa vaayirasii koroonaatiin dheerina yeroo sa’atii-24 gidduutti rikordii du’aa 884 qabdi turte.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: Ebla 3 kutaa Newuu yoorki keessatti baay’inni dhukkubsattootaa 100,000 caale. Waayit Haawus miidhaa salphisee ilaaluunii fi ergaa hoggantoota fayyaa kallattii too’achuun akkasumas saayintistoota dhimma ummata qindeessanii fi maxxansoota vaayirasicha wajjiin walqabatan waajjira Itti Aanaa Pirezidaantii Maayik Peensi irratti komatame.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Mirkaneessi guutummaa to’annoo balaa Traamp sararawwan deeggaraa irratti bakka lamatti citeera.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Hoggantoonnii fi yaada kennitoonni U.S. tokko tokko U.S.’n meeshaalee addaa dabalatee, dhiheessa meedikaalaa barbaachisoo, Chaayinaa irraa galu irratt hirkachii ishee komatan.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Xiinxalli haala imala qilleensaa haala baballina weerarichaa kaartessuu fi tilmaamuuf kan fayyadamamee fi barruu ‘Travel Medicine’ irratti walakkeessa Amajjii 2020 tti dha kan maxxanfame.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Odeeffannoo Waldaa Geejjiba Qilleensaa bara 2018 irratti hundaa’uun Baankook, Hoongi Koongi, Tookiyoo, fi Taayipee hamma imaltootaa Wuhaan irraa imalan olaanaa qabu ture.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: Dubaayi, Siwiidin, fi Meelboorni gahuumsawwan beekamoo imaltoota Wuhaan irraa dhufanii akka ta’an gabaafame.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Baaliin magaalota 20 galma beekamaa qabanii fi qophaa’ummaa qaban keessaa gadi aantuu akka taate gabaafame, yoo magaalonni Awustiraaliyaa caalaatti kan danda’an ta’anii fudhataman. Awustiraaliyaan karoora deebii muddamaa vaayirasii koroonaa haaraa (COVID-19) Gurraandhala 7 ifoomsite.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: Ammayyuu waanti baay’een waa’ee COVID-19 argamuu akka qabu, akkasumas Awustiraaliyaan to’annoo daangaafi quunnamtii weerara addunyaawaa ilaalchisee akka xiinxaltu ibseera.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: Bitootessa 21, labsiin muddamaa baayoosakkiwuuritii namaa Awustaraaliyaatti labsame

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Hojiirra oolmaa adda foo’insa geejjiba hawaasaa Wuhaanii fi Hubei ilaacha keessa galchuun, biyyoonni baay’een lammmiilee isaanii fi dippiloomaatota naannoo Sanaa baasuuf karoorfatan, keessattuu lammiilee biyyaa karaa balali’iinsaatiin, abbootii taayitaa Chaayinaa kanneen qulqullummaa dhiheessan wajjiin ta’uun.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Kaanaadaa, Yuunayitid Isteetsi, Jaappaan, Hindi, Sirii Laankaa, Awustiraaliyaa, Faransaayyi, Jarman fi Taayilaand lammiilee isaanii qofaatti tursiiuuf kan karoorfatan keessaa warra duraati.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: Paakistaan akka jettetti lammiilee homaatuu Chaayinaa irraa akka hin baafte himte.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 7, Biraazil Poles afur, nama Chaayinaa fi lammii Hindi dabalatee lammiilee Biraazil34 ykn miseensota maatii qofaatti baaste.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Lammiileen Poolaandi, Chaayinaa fi Hindii, bakka xiyyaarri Biraazil utuu imalasaa gara Biraazil ittin fufiin dura boqotee turetti xiyyaararraa buufaman.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: Lammiileen Biraaziil gara Wuhaan imalan buufata waraanaa cinaa Biraaziiliyaatti qubatan.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Guyyaa walfakkaataa irratti, Kaanaadonni 215 (176 xiyyaara jalqabaa irraa, fi 39 xiyyaara lammataa mootummaa U.S.’n dhiyaate irraa) turban lamaaf qofaatti baafamuuf Wuhaan irraa gara CFB Trenton tti akka gadhiisan godhaman.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Gurraandhala 11 tti, xiyyaarri biraa warra Kaanaadaa 185 Wuhaan irraa baatu CFB Trenton tti qubate.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Abbootiin taayitaa Awustaraaliyaa Gurraandhala 3 fi 4’tti lammiilee 277 naannoo balaa qabu irraa gara Giddugala Uggura Kiriismas Ayislaanditti fidan, booda gara buufata adda baasuutiif kan qophaa’e, iddoo itti guyyoota 14’f turan.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: Barrisuun gadhiisanii deemuu Niiw Ziiland Gurraandhala 5 tti Auckland gahe; imaltoonni isaa (muraasa Awustiraaliyaa fi Paasifik irraa dabalatee) hundee naavaal Waangaapaaroo, Ooklaand Kaabaa keessatti qofaatti baafaman.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: Muddee gaafa 15, Yuunaayitid Isteetsi imaltoota doonii ‘Diamond Princess’ akka qofaatti tursiistu beeksistee turte.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: Gurraandhala 21 tti, xiyyaarri imaltoota Kaanaadaa 129 baatu kan Diamond Princess keessaa akka gadhiisu godhame Trenton, Ontario keessa qubate.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: Bitootesssa gar duraa keessa, mootummaan Hindii lammiilee ishee Iraan keessaa baasuu eegalte. Bitootessa gaafa 14, xiyyaarri Daandii Qilleensaa Afrikaa Kibbaa baasii Mootummaa Afrikaa Kibbaatiin lammiilee Afrikaa Kibbaa 112 gara biyyaatti deebisteetti.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: Sakatta'insi wal'aansaa balaliin dura kan taasifamee fi lammiileen Afrikaa Kibbaa afur mallattoolee agarsiisaa turan, miidhaa hir’isuuf jecha lafatti hafanii turan.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Lammiilee Afrikaa Kibbaa qorannoon isaanii nagatiiva ta’e qofatu gara biyya isaanii deebi’e.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: Firiiwwan qorannoo gareewwan balalii, balaliistota, hojjettoota hoteelaa, poolisii fi loltoota akka tarkaanfii of eeggannootti ergama namoomaa keessatti hirmaatan dabalatee lammiilee Afrikaa Kibbaa hunda baasuun, hundisaanii hordoffii fi iddoo turtii wayita guyyoota 14 f ‘The Ranch Resort’ keessa tursiifamaniiru.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa 20, Yuunaayitid Isteet sababa weeraraatiif hamma tokko loltuuwwan ishee Iraaq keessaa baasuu eegalte.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 5, ministeerri alaa Chaayinaa biyyoonni 21 (Beelaaruus, Paakistaan, Tirinidaad fi Toobaagoo, Igiptii fi Iraan dabalatee)deeggarsa Chaayinaatti erguu eereera.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: Barattoonni Chaayinaa muraasi Yunivarsiitii Amerikaa keessaa kutaawwan Chaayinaa vaayirasiin miidhamaniif gargaarsa erguuf waliin gurmaa’an, garee iddoo guddaa Chikaagoo keessaa waliin ta’uun haala yaadamneen golgaawwan N95 50,000 hospitaalota konyaa Hubei keessa jiraniitti gaafa Amajjii 30 erguuu danda’aniiru. Dhaabbati gargaarsa namummaa Direct Relief, FedEx waliin qindaa’uun, golgaawwan fuulaa 200,000 meeshaa eegumsa dhuunfaa waliin, uffatoota harkaa fi gonfawwan, Amajjii 30 tti gara Gamtaa Hospitaala Wuhaanitti xiyyaara yeroo hatattamaan erganiiru.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 5, Biilii fi Miliindaa Geetsi qorannoo talaallii fi tattaaffiiwwan yaalii “ummattoota Afrikaa fi Eeshiyaa balaa keessa jiran” eegaa akka raawwataman gargaaruuf arjooma miiliyoona $100 ifoomsaniiru.

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Akka Interaaksiyoon gabaasetti mootummaan Chaayinaa Filiippiinsiif deeggarsa haguugduu fuulaa 200,000 Gurraandhala 6 arjoome, akkuma miseensi Paarlaamaa Riichaard Gaarden haguugduu fuulaa miliyoona 3.16 ergeen.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Gurraandhala 19tti, Qaxxaamurri Diimaan Singaapoor gargaarsa Chaayinaatiif doolaara miiliyoona 2.26 akka baasu beeksise.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Jaappaan maaskii fuulaa miiliyoona tokko Wuhaaniif arjoomte, Turki meeshaa fayyaa saffisaan ergite, Raashiyaana meeshaa fayyaa toonii 13 Wuhaaniif ergite, Maaleezhiyaan deeggarsa haguugduu harkaa miiliyoona 18 Chaayinaaf arjoomu ifoomsite, Jarman dhiheessa meedikaalaa garaagara uffata Haazmaat 10,000 dabalatee dhiheessite, akkasumas Yuunaayitid Isteet meeshaa meedikaalaa toonii 17.8 Chaayinaaf arjoomtee akkasumas dabalataan biyyoota hubaman gargaaruuf doolaara miiliyoona 100 waadaa galte. Erga haalli Chaayinaa tasgabbaa’ee, biyyattiin biyyoota weeraraan rukutaman garaagaraatiif gargaarsa ergaa jirti.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Bitootessa keessa, Chaayinaa, Kuubaa fi Raashiyaan, jalqabbii vaayirasii koroonaa wajjiinii irratti gargaaruuf dhiyeessiilee wal'aansaa fi ogeeyyii gara Xaaliyaaniitti erganiiru.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Daldalaan Jack Ma meeshaalee qorannoo miiliyoona 1.1, haguuggii fuulaa miiliyoona 6, fi uffataalee of eeggannoo 60,000 Gamtaa Afrikaatiin akka qoodamuuf Etiyoophiyaa, Addis Ababaatti ergeera.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Boodarra meeshaalee qorannoo 5,000, haguuggii fuulaa 100,000 fi ventileeteroota 5 Paanaamaatti erge.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Ma’n akkasumas dhiyeessiiwwan wal’aansaa Kaanaadaaf arjoomeera. Warri Neezerlaand, Ispeen, Turkii, Joorjiyaa, akkasumas Cheek Rippaabiliik golgaawwaniif meeshaawwan qorannoo warri Chaayinaa hojjetan irratti yaada isaanii ibsataniiru.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, Ispeen meeshaalee qorannoo vaayirasii koroonaa 58,000 sirrummaan isaa %30 qofa jechuun keessaa baate, yeroma kana, Neezarlaandi maaskii fuulaa 600,000 sirrii hin taane deebifte.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Beeljiyeem haguugduu fuulaa 100,000 itti dhimmi hin bahamin, kan Chaayinaa irraa jedhamee yaadamu, garuu dhugaatti Kolombiyaa irraa kan ta’e.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: Karaa biraatiin, gargaarsi Chaayinaa kutaalee Laatin Ameerikaa fi Afrikaatti haala gaariin fudhatame. Ebla 2 irratti, Baankiin Addunyaa gargaarsa muddamaa biyyoota guddataa jiraniif jalqabsiise.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO’n tattaaffii aanga’oonni Chaayinaa weeraricha hogganuu fi to’achuuf godhaniif beekamtee kenneera.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO’n walbira qabaa weerara SARS 2002-2004, kan odeeffannoo dhoksuun aanga’oota Chaayinaa tattaaffiiwwan ittisaa fi to’annoo boodatti harkisee, fi dabboo ammaa, kan mootummaan giddu galeessaa “walitti qabama hawaasaa Ayyaana Bara Haaraa Ji’aa’nii hambisuuf idileedhaan odeeffannoo haaraa kennaa jiru”, qabateera.

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Amajjii gaafa 23, murtoo aanga’onni uggura geejjibaa Wuhan raawwachiisuuf godhan irratti akka deebiitti, bakka bu’aan WHO Gauden Galea’n “kun gorsa WHO tiin kan ta’e miti,” jedhanii hubachiisuudhaan, “kunimmoo bakka inni hunda caalaa itti walitti qabame kanattti weeraricha to’achuuf kutannoo jiruuf mullistuu baayyee barbaachistuu” kan ta’esii fi “Seenaa Fayyaa Hawaasaa keessatti dursi kan hin jirreefdha” jechuun waamaniiru. Amajjii gaafa 30, daddarbiinsi namaa-namattii Chaayinaan alatti mirkana’uu fi biyyoota biroo keessattiin ta’iileen dabaluu hordofuudhaan, WHO’n weerara kana Dhimma Balaa Fayyaa Hawaasa Addunyaa (PHEIC) jechuun labsuun, erga wayita weerara addunyaa ‘swine flu’ 2009 ttiitii tarkaanfiin kun fudhatameetii PHEIC ja’affaa ta’eera.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Daayirektarri waliigalaa WHO Tedros Adhanom PHEI n sababa “ balaa tatamsa’ina addunyaattii, keessattuu biyyoota galii gadi aanaa fi giddu galeessa qabaatanii sirna fayyaa amansiisaa hin qabnetti ta’udha” jechuun dubbataniiru.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Deebii hojiirra oolmaa ittisa imalaatiif, Tedros kan jedhan “imalaa fi daldala addunyaa irratti tarkaanfii hin barbaachifne sababni fudhannuuf tokko hin jiru” akkasumas “Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’n daldalaa fi sochii ittisuu hin deeggaru.”

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Gurraandhala 5, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) hawaasa addunyaatiif deeggarsa doolaara miiliyoona 675 biyyoota galii gadi aanaa qaban baajataan “kanneen sirna namoota vaayirasichi jiraatus qabaman adda baasuu hin dandeenye” gargaaruuf gaafate.

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros itti fufuudhaan “hammi jabina keenyaa, hamma hidhaa laaftuu keenyaati”haasaa jedhu kan taasisanii fi ummatni addunyaa “har’a hojiitti bobba’uu ykn booda kan caalu akka baasu” akeekkachiisaniiru. Guraandhala gaafa 11,konfireensii pireesii irratti COVID-19 akka maqaa dhukkubichaatti hundeesseera.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Guyyaama walfakkaataatti, Tedros Barreessaa Olaanaan UN Antonio Guterres “aangoo waliigalaa sirna UN kenniinsa deebii keessatti” dhiyeessuuf akka waliigalan himaniiru .

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: Gareen Bulchiinsa Rakkoo UN kanaan gara hojiitti galuun, kan WHO’n “wayita ejensiiwwan biroon agarsiistuuwwan hawaasaa, diinagdee fi misoomaa weerirachaa irratti beekumsa gadi fagoo wayita argatanitti, isaaniimmoo deebii fayyaa irratti akka xiyyeeffatan taasisa”, jechuun kan lafa kaa’e, deebii waliigalaa Yuunaayitid Neeshinsii kan qindeessudha.

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Gaafa Guraandhala 14, gareen ergamaa WHO-dhaan durfameefi China waliin ogeeyyii WHO akkasumas idil adduunyaa Chaayinaatti sarara duraa irra jiran gargaaruufi hooggansa biyya keessaa “daddarbiinsaafi hammina dhukkubichaa” xiinxaluuf walgahiifi workishooppii dhaabbilee biyyoolessaa murteessoo ta’an waliin doo’ii bakkee godhuudhaan “firii ittisa dhukkubichaaf godhame sadarkaa pirooviinsiifi kaawuntiitti, magaalafi baadiyyaa dabalatee” gochuudhaaf jalqabame. Gaafa Guraandhala 25, WHOn yoo yeroodhaaf weerara dhibeeti jechuuf nudandeessisuu baatellee, biyyoonni “sirna qophaa’uu keessa” jiraachuu qabu jechuun labsii “addunyaan dhibee daddarbaa haaraa ta’uu deemuuf of qopheessuu qaba” jechuun labse.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Weerara Iraan keessatti baballachaa jiruuf akka deebiitti, WHO’n haalicha galmeessuudhaaf Garee Ergama Waliinii garasitti ergeera. Guraandhala gaafa 28, qondaaltonni WHO, sadarkaa addunyaatti madaalliin miidhaa koronaavaayiresii “olaanaa” irraa gara “baayyee olaanaatti”,sadarkaa waamichaa fi madaallii miidhaa isaa olaanaatti ce’uu danda’a jedhaniiru.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Maayik Riyaan, Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’tti hogganaa olaanaa sagantaa fayyaa ariifachiisaa, jecha “mootummoota pilaaneetii kanarra jiran hundaaf kun sakatta’iinsa dhugaati: dammaqaa jedhu keessatti akeekkachiisan.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Vaayirasiin kun karaa isaa irra jiraachuu mala kanaaf qophaa’uu qabdu, “tarkaanfiin deebii sirriin addunyaan akka too’attu gargaaruu akka danda’u akeekkachiisaa “hammeenya isaa”.

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan itti dabaluudhaan daataan ammaa weerara addunyaa jedhanii labsuuf aanga’oota fayyaa hawaasaaf wabii akka hin taane himanii, labsiileen akkasii hiikkaa, “namoonni pilaaneetii kanarra jiraatan hundi vaayiresichaaf saaxilamoo ta’uusaanii fudhachaa jirra” jedhaniiru.

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa 11, Dhaabbani Fayyaa Addunyaa WHO’n vaayirasiin koroonaa weerara akka ta’e labse.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Hogganaan-Waliigalaa akka jedhanitti Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’n “sadarkaa tatamsa’inaa lallabuu fi hammeenya, akkasumas sadarkaa al-gochaa akeekkachiisuu irratti gadi fageenyaan xiyyeeffatee ture.” WHO’n too’annaa weerarichaa gahaa hin taane fi vaayirasicha akka weeraratti adda baasuu kanneen jedhuun balaaleffatamee ture.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Deebiin kun iyyannoo Daayirektera Waliigalaa WHO Tedros Adhanom kan hojii gadhiisuu isaatiif namoota 733,000n Eebla gaafa 6 mallatta’e ni hammata.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 26, 2020 ogeeyyiin mirga namoomaa UN danuun wayita weerara addunyaa COVID-19 kanatti mirgi nama dhuunfaa kamiiyyuu kabajamuu irratti xiyyeeffataniiruu.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Gareen ogeessota akka jedhanitti namni kamuu giddu seentummaa lubbuu baraaruuf godhamuu argachuuf mirga kan qabuu fi mootummaan immoo itti gaafatamummaa kanaa qaba.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Garee murtaa’e adda basuuf hanqinni qabeenyaa fi wabii fayyaa yoomiyyuu akka sababa akka hin fayyadne garichi dhiibbaa uume.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Namni dhuunfaa kamuu mirga fayyaa qabaachuu qaba, namoota miidhaa qaamaa qaban, garee xiqqaa, namoota dullooman, ummata keessaa buqqa’an, mana dhabeeyyii, kanneen hiyyummaa hamaa keessa jiraatan, namoota uggura keessa jiran, godaantotaa fi gareen adda hin bahin kanneen biroo gargaarsa mootummaa akka barbaadan ogeeyyonni jala muran.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Dhaabbileen addunyaa dhiibbaa balaan COVID-19 diinagdee fi hawaasummaa irraan gahaa jiru irratti dubbataa jiru.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Tumsaafi Dagaagina Diinagdeef odeeffannoo yeroon ta’ee fi hunda galeessa ta’e dhiyeessuuf hujeeffannoo deebiiwwan imaammataa biyyoota addunyaa keessaa irratti, akkasumas ilaalchotaafi gorsa irratti jalqabsiiseera.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Imaammatoota irraa sirnoota fayyaa fi diinagdee addunyaa jabeessuuf miidhaawwan ugguraafi daangeffamuu imalaa irratti fala barbaaduuf, wiirtuun dijitaalaa Faana dhooftuu Imaammata Biyyaa hammata, fi biyyoonni akka isaan walirraa baratan akkasumas rakkoo vaayirasii koroonaaf deebii addunyaawaa qindaa’e haala mijeessuuf akeeka.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Mootummaan Chaayinaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsiin, Ministeera Waajjira kaabinee UK, Michael Goven, fi ilma pireezidaantii Biraazil Jair Bolsonaro, Eduardo Bolsonaro niin haala qabiinsa weerara addunyaa, godina Chaayinaa Hubei keessatti jalqabee irratti qeeqamaa jira.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Bulchitoonni sadarkaa godinaa Paartii Kooministii Chaayinaa (CPC) hedduun sababa akkaataa qabiinsa iddoo tursiisaa Giddu gala Chaayinaattiif, akka mallattoo deebii weerarichaaf kennamu irratti ejjennoowwan siyaasaa fudhatamanitti gammadoo ta’uu dhiisuu isaanii mullisuun hojii isaaniirra kaafamaniiru.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Yaada kennitoonni muraasni sochiin kun barreessaa olaanaa Paartii Kooministii Chaayinaa Xi Jinping weerara koronaavaayiresichaa irratti aarii ummataa irraa tiksuuf kan kaayyefate akka ta’e amanu.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Qondaaltonni Chaayinaa muraasni, fknf Zhao Lijian weerarri koronaavaayiresii Wuhan keessatti jalqabe jedhamuun dursee kan dubbatame, yaadrimeewwan COVID-19 hin mirkanoofne U.S. ykn Xaaliyaaniidha jechuun haalaniiru.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Bulchiisni Donald Trump kan U.S. coronaavaayiresichaan “vaayiresii Chaayinaa” ykn “vaayiresii Wuhan” jechuun moggaasuudhaan, Chaayinaan“odeeffannoosaa dhoksuun vaayiresii amma weerara addunyaatti jijjiirame kana akkaan olkaaseera” jechuun isaanii, qeeqxota muraasaab akka arrabsoo sanyummaatti fi “dadhabina bulchiinsisaa dhukkubicha to’achuurratti qabu irraa xiyyeeffannoo kaasuufiin” qeeqamaa ture.

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Akka argatetti tooftaa walqunnamtii sararaa diriirsuu mootummaan U.S. argama ifa galeessa Koree Nageenya BIyyaalessaa keessaa wajjiin, tooftaa “wanti hunduu waa’ee Chaayinaati” jedhamee kaa’ame wajjiin.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Akka yaalluuf fi ergaa kana karaa danda’amu kamiiniyyuu akka baasnuuf nutti himamaa jira, yaa’iiwwan pireesii fi muldhiiwwan televiiziyoonaa dabalatee. Maddooti akka Politico, Imaammata Alaa, fi Bloomberg carraaqqiiwwan Chaayinaan gargaarsa gara biyyoota vaayirasiin miidhamaniitti erguuf gootu dhiibbaa addunyaatiif dhiibbaa qaama ololaati jedhan.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Itti gaafatamaan seera biyya alaa EU Jooseep Boorreel “qaama ji’oopolotiksii naanna’uudhaan dhiibbaa uumuus dabalatee akkasumas ‘siyaasa arjoomaa’” akka jiru akeekkachiisan.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Boorreellis akka jedhanitti “Chaayinaan ergaa haala cimaadhaan dhiibaa jirti, akka US miti, kun hariiroo itti gaafatamummaa qabuu fi amanamaadha. ”

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Chaayinaanins US akka uggura Syria, Venezuweelaa fi Iraan irraa kaaftuuf waamicha dhiyeessiteetti, akka gabaafameen biyyoota boodaa lamaaniif gargaarsa erguun.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Gumaachi golgaawwan 100,000 kan Jaak Maan Kuubaaf kennan Ebla 3 adabbii US’tiin uggurame.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Angawoonni US dabalataan gargaarsa biyyoota biraaf ture gara biyya mataa isaaniitti maqsuu isaaniin himatamaniiru.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Fi waldhabdeewwan haguuggii waliin walqabatan biyyoota biroo akka Jarmanii, Oostiriyaa fi Siwiizerlaand; fi Cheek Repubilikii fi Xaaliyaanii gidduutti gabaafamaa jiru.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Dabalataan, Turkiin meeshaawwan hargansuu dhibbaan lakkaa’aman kan Ispeeniif karoorfaman qabatteetti.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Bitootessa gara duraa keessa, mootummaan Xaaliyaanii koronaavaayiresiin kan miidhamte Xaaliyaaniif dirmannaa hin taasisne jechuun komateera.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: EU’tti ambaasaaddarri Xaaliyaanii Maurizio Massari n, “Chaayinaa qofatu gam-lamaan deebise jedhan.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Ta’us, kun mallattoo gaarii tokkummaa Awurooppaatii miti.”

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Bitootessa 22 tti, waamicha bilbilaa Muummicha Ministeeraa Xaaliyaan Giuseppe Conte booda, Pireezidaantiin Raashiyaa Vladimir Putin raayyaa Raashiyaanotaa barattoota wal’aansaa (doktaroota), konkolaataawwan addaa baakteeriyaa dhukkuba fidu ajjeesuun qulqulleessan, fi meeshaa wal’aansaa kan biraa Xaaliyaanitti erguuf mijeessan.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Gaazexaan Xaaliyaanii La Stampa’n madda hin beekamne, “madda siyaasaa sadarkaa olaanaa” tuquudhaan gargaarsi Raashiyaa dhibbentaan 80 “Xaaliyaaniif faayidaa kan hinqabne ykn faayidaa xinnoo qabu” jedheera.

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Raashiyaan “siyaasaa fi diploomaasii” arrabsoo hammaa eegaluu ishee maddichi yakke.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Piresidaantiin Lombardy, Attilio Fontana fi Ministeerri Dhimma Alaa Xaaliyaanii Luigi Di Maio n gabaasee miidiyaa kan maqsanii fi kabaja isaaniis ibsataniiru.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Raashiyaanis xiyyaara fe’isaa gargaarsa meedikaalaa waliin Yuunaayitid Isteetsitti ergiteetti.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Dubbi himaan Kremlin Dmitry Peskov “yemmuu hiriyaawwan hojii US’f gargaarsa goonu, [Putin] yemmuu oomishtoonni meeshaalee meedikaalaa fi mi’ootaa olaantummaa argatan, yoo barbaachise gargalchuufis ni malu, jedhanii tilmaamu” jechuun dubbataniiru.

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: NATO’n karoorfame “ittisa 2020” shaakala toltummaa Jarman, Poolaandi, fi kutaa Baaltik keessatti, shaakala NATO guddaa erga waraana qorraatii kaasee, hamma xiqqaateen taasifama.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Barreessaa olaanaan Duula Hiikkachiisa Niwkileraa Kate Hudson shaakala Qolannaa 2020 wayita qeeqan: “Dabboo fayyaa-hawaasaa ammaa kana keessatti, lubbuu loltoota US fi biyyoota Europe hedduu hirmaachaa jiranii qofaa utuu hin taane kan lubbu qabeeyyii biyyoota isaan keessatti socho’aniillee balaarra kan buusudha.” Mootummaan Iraan miseensonni paarlaamaa naannoo daarzaana lamaa akkasumas dureewwan siyaasaa ammaa fi duraa kudha shan biroon jalaa hubamuudhaan vaayiresichaan hedduu miidhamteetti.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Pirezidaantiin Iraan Hassan Rouhani’n biyyi isaanii sababa qoqqobbii Yuunaayitid Isteets Iraan irra keesseen gabaa addunyaatti hirmaachuu dhabuun weeraricha qolachuuf carraaqaa jirti jechuun Bitootessa gaafa 14, 2020 gargaarsa gaafachuuf dureewwan addunyaatiif xaalayaa barreessaniiru. Weerarri kunis Yuunaayitid Isteetsi imaammatawwan hawaasummaa biyyoota badhaadhoo biroo eegumsa fayyaa waliigalaa, eegumsa daa’immanii waliigalaa, kaffaltii maatiiwwan ittiin wal gargaaran, fi fayyaa hawaasaatiif fandiiwwan sadarkaa olaanoo taasisuu dabalatee akka hojiirra oolchitu dirqamsiiseera.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Xiinxaltoonni siyaasaa filannoo pirezindaantummaa 2020 irratti carraa Donald Trump irra deebiin filatamuuf qaban irratti dhiibbaa gadhee qabaachuu akka malu dubbatu. Hariiroon dippilomaasii Jaappaanii fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa sababa weera addunyaa kanaan caalaatti hammaateera.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Erga Jaappaan nama Kooriyaan Kibbaa irraa dhufu kamuu iddoowwan mootummaan qopheesse keessa torbanoota lamaaf qofaatti baafamuu isaanii beeksiftee eegaltee Kooriyaa Kibbaa “tattaaffiiwwan qofaatti baasuu ifa hin taaneef si’awaa hin taane” kan Jaappaan qeeqxeetti.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Hawaasni Kooriyaa Kibbaa deebii pirezidaanti Moon Jae-in rakkina kanarratti kennaniin jalqabarratti giddu gidduu ta’anii turan.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Kooriyoonni baay’een iyyata mallatteessaniiru himannaa Moon’f jalqabbii dhukkubichaa seeraan to’achuu dadhabuu mootummaa isaan jedhan irratti waamicha gochuuf, yookaan deebiisaa galateeffachuuf. Weerarri addunyaawaa isa ilaalchisee biyyoonni akka isaan seera hiikuu balaa hatattamaa labsan hayyameera.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Yaada kennitoonni muraasi inni mootummoonni qabannoo isaanii aangoo irratti akka jabessan hayyamuu akka danda’u yaaddoowwan ibsaniiru.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Hangaarii keessatti, paarlaamaan isaa Muummicha Ministeeraa, Viiktoor Orbaan, yeroo hin murtoofneef akka inni labsiin bulchu, paarlaamaa akkasumas filannoowwan yeroof akka dhaabuu fi sanneen odeeffannoo sobaa waa’ee vaayirasichaafi akkaataa mootummaan balaa to’atu facaasan akka adabu hayyamuuf filateera.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa sababoota hedduuf balaaleffatama hanqina dhiheessaa, weerara qolachuuf haala olaanaan itti fayyadamamuu meeshaalee sadarkaa addunyaatti dabaluu, bittaa burjaaja’aa, fi miidhamuu warshaa fi sochii fe’uumsaa.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Qorichaa Yuunaayitid Isteet waa’ee hanqina qorichaa fi meeshaalee yaalaa sababa daballii fayyadamaatiinii fi dadhabuu dhiheessaatiin muudate akeekkachiise.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Jiraattonni naannoos bittaa hawaasa ballaan geggeeffame kan mi’oonni gurgurtaa hedduu barbaadaman kanneen akka nyaataa, sooftii, fi bishaan saamsamaan faan minjaalarraa dhumuu fi hanqina dhiyeessiif sababa ta’uu ragaa ba’aniiru.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Industiriin teknoloojii keessattuu harkifannaa geejjiba meeshaalee elektirooniksii irratti akeekkachiiseera.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Akka Daarektara Olaanaa WHO Teediroos Adhaanomitti, fedhiin meeshaa eegumsa dhuunfaa dachaa 100’n dabaleera.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Fedhiin kun daballiin gatii isa dhaabbii irraa si’a diigdama akka dabalu akkasumas dhiheessi meeshaalee fayyaa ji’oota afurii hanga jahaatii akka darbu taasise.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
