targetString: Hanqina meeshaalee of eeggannoo dhuunfaa, WHO’n hojjettoota fayyaa balaarra buusa jechuun akeekkachiiseefis sababa ta’eera.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Awustiraaliyaa keessatti, weerarri addunyaa kun shammattoonni daigou oomishaalee Awustiraaliyaa Chaayinaatti akka gurguraniif carraa haaraa baneefi.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Sochiin kunis suuppermaarkeetota muraasa keessatti hanqinaata nyaata daa’immanii kan uumee fi Mootummaa Awustiraaliyaatiin battalatti uggarameera. Baballinaa olaanaa ta’iilee COVID-19 Kaaba Xaaliyaanii fi naannoo Wuhan, fi fedhiilee oomishaalee nyaataa mirkaneessuun alatti, naanooleen lameen hanqinoota nyaataa hamaarraa baraaramaniiru.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Tarkaanfiiwwan Chaayinaafi Xaaliyaaniin kuufamaafi daldala seeraala oomishoota murteessoo irratti fudhataman milkaa’oo turani, hanqina nyaataa hatattamaa dursanii yaadaman Awurooppaa akksumas Amerikaa Kaabaa keessatti dhowwuu.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Kaabni Xaaliyaan oomisha qonnaa guddaa ishee waliin hir’ina guddaa hin argine, garuu gatiiwwan akkaataa bakka bu’oota industiriitti dabaluu malu.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Baattoowwan nyaataa duwwaa ta’an yeroo gabaabaaf qofaa mudatan, magaalaa Wuhaan keessatillee, yeroo qondaaltonni mootummaa Chaayinaa hambaawwan foon booyyee soorata gahaa uummataa mirkaneessuuf gadhiisanitti.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Seeronni walfakkaataan Xaaliyaan keessa oomishtoonni nyaataa akka isaan balaawwan hatattamaa akkasiif nyaata kuusuu isaanii barbaadan ni jiru.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Miidhaan diinagdee addunyaa Chaayinaa keessatti mullachaa jira: akka gabaasa miidiyaa Bitootessa gaafa 16 tti, sababa tarkaanfilee baballina vaayiresii to’achuuf mootummaan fudhatamani, fi gurgurtaan shaqaxaa 20.5%n gadi bu’eef, diinagdeen Chaayinaa ji’oota jalqabaa lamaan 2020 tti hedduu miidhamee ture.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Akka biyyaatti Chaayinaan wiirtuu diinagdee fi oomishaa guddoodha, jalqabbiin dhukkuba vaayirasiin dhufuu diinagdee addunyaa doorsisa tasgabbaa’ina dhabsiisu ta’ee ilaalame.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agaatee Deemaraayis kan garee Nageenya Diinagdee hanga bu’aa guddaa irraa mallattoon ifatti mul’atutti jijjiiramni gabaa akka itti fufu raage.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Amajjii 2020 tti, xiinxaltoonni muraasi bu’aan gadhee diinagdee weerara iddoo murtaa’ee guddina addunyaa irratti fidu kan jalqabbii SARS 2002–2004 caaluu akka danda’u tilmaamani.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Tilmaamni ogeessa Yuuniversiitii Washington kan St. Louis keessaa, kan hanga waggaa lamaatti turuu malu dhiibbaa biiliyoona $300+ fuuncaa dhiyeessii addunyaarra kaa’eera.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Biyyoota Peetrooliyeemii Gabaa-alaaf dhiyeessanii (OPEC) akka gabaasaaleetti fedhiin Chaayinaa gadi bu’uu isaatiin gatiin zayitaa erga kufeetii “akka dhabaniiru.”

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Gabaan meeshaalee addunyaa sababa olka’iinsa guddaa ta’iilee COVID-19 lafa Chaayinaan alattiitiin Guraandhala gaafa 24 kufeera.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Gurraandhala 27’tti, sababa olka’uu sodaa weerara vaayirasii koroonaatiin, indeeksiin mankuusaa U.S. NASDAQ-100, SfiP 500 Indeeksi dabalatee, akkasumas Giddugalli Industirii Dow Joonsi gadi bu’iinsa isaani bara 2008 irraa kaasee jiru maxxansan, gadi bu’uu Dow qabxiilee 1,191 wajjiin, erga miidhaa faayinaansii bara 2007-08 tii gadi bu’a guyyaa tokkoo isa guddaadha.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Qoodamoonni sadeen hundi torbanitti %10 caala gadi bu’u.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 28, ‘Scope Ratings GmbH’ hamma liqeessuu dandeettii liqeessuu Chaayinaa mirkaneesseera, garuu, ilaacha negetiiviisaa qabateema tureera.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Sodaa koronaavaayiresiitiin mi’oonni ammas dhumaniiru, kufaatii guddaa Bitootessa 16 ta’edha.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Baayyonni kufaatiin diinagdee mudachuuf mijataadha jedhu.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Hayyuun diinagdee Mohaammed El-Eriyaan mootummaa fi baankii seentaraal tarkaanfii saffisaa yeroo isaa eeggateef kadhatan.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Baankonni giddu galeessaa kisaaraa maallaqaa 2008 caalaatti aariitiin deebii laachaa jiru.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Turiizimiin seektaroota haala baay’ee gadheen sababa dhowwamuu imalaatiin, cufamuu iddoowwan uummataan hawwannaa imalaa dabalatee, akkasumas gorsa mootummootaa imala kamuu addunyaa hundumaa irratti godhamuun miidhaman keessaa tokko.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Akka miidhaatti, daandiiwwan qilleensaa lakkoosaan hedduun Daandiiwwan Qilleensaa Biriitish, Daandiiwwan Qilleensa Baha Chaayinaa fi Qantas dabalatee fedhiin hirdhachuu hordofee balaliiwwan haqaniiru, daandiin qilleensaa naannawaa Biriitish Flybe nimmoo gadi buuse.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Miidhaan industirii sarara doonii irra gahe kan sadarkaa kana dura argamee hin beekneeti.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Buufatoonni baaburaa fi bidiruu hedduunis cufamaniiru.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Weerarri kun waqtii imalaa kabaja ayyaana Bara Haaraa Chaayinaa waliin walqabtu ‘Chunyun’ waliin walirra bu’e.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Ta’iileen hedduun walitti qabama namootaa hedduu qaban feestivaalota ayyaana Bara Haaraa dabalatee mootummoota naannoolee fi biyyaan haqamaniiru, kaampaanonni dhuunfaas suuqiilee fi hawwattoota tuurizimii isaanii kanneen akka ‘Hong Kong Disneyland ’ fi ‘Shanghai Disneyland’ of danda’anii cufaa jiru.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Taateewwan Waggaa Haaraa Ji’a waliin walqabataniifi hawwaannaawwan tuuristii walitti qabama tuutaa ittisuuf cufamaniiru, magaalaa Foorbideen Beejiing keessaa fi manneen qulqullummaa aadaa dabalatee.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Konyaawwan Chaayinaa 31 keessaa 24 keessatti, manneen qopheessaa fi naannoleen, angaawonni ayyaana Waggaa Haaraa gara Gurraandhala 10 tti dheeressaniiru, iddoowwan hojii irra caalaa hamma guyyaa sanaatti akka deebi’anii hin banamne qajeelcha kennuun.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Naannoleen kunneen GDP 80% fi alergii 90% biyyatti kan uwwisanidha.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hoongi Koongi sadarkaa deebii dhukkuba daddarbaa ol guddifte akkasumas labsii muddamaa labsite, Bitootessa keessa mana barnootaa cufte akkasumas ayyaana Bara Haaraa haqxe. Seektarri gurgurtaa akka addunyaatti hubame, yeroon mankuusaa gadi bu’uu yookaan irra keessoon cufamuudhaan.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Qanxabdoota bira qaamaan deemuun Europe fi Laatin Amerikaa keessatti 40% dhaan hir’ateera.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Dhiheessitoonni Ameerikaa Kaabaa fi Giddugala Bahaa hir’ina %50–60 argan.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Kun ammas Gurraandhala waliin gaafa walbira qabamu gara wiirtuuwwan suuqiitti gad bu’a traafikii miilaa 33–43% Bitootessa keessa agarsiiseera.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Sochoostonni giddu gala daldalaa addunyaarra jiran tarkaanfilee dabalataa akka qulqullina dabalataa, tempireechara bittootaa ilaaluuf sakattaatuu ho’aa galchuu, fi ta’iilee haquu fudhataniiru. Akka tilmaama koomishinii Diinagdee Laatin Amerikaatti, kufaatiin weerara addunyaa kanaan dhufu namoota Laatin Amerikaa miiliyoona 14 fi 22 gidduu ta’an, weeraricha malee haala isaan keessa turan caalaatti hiyyummaa hamaarra kan buusudha.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Amajjii fi Guraandhala 2020 keessa, wayita weerarri addunyaa kun sadarkaa guddaarra ga’etti, Chaayinaa keessaa namoonni miiliyoona 5 hojii isaanii dhabaniiru.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Hojjettoonni godaansa baadiyyaa Chaayinaa miiliyoona 300 tti siqan godinoota giddu gidduutti kan gataman ykn Hubei keessatti kan danqamandha. Bitootessa 2020 keessa, Amerikaanonni miiliyoona 10 ol ta’an hojii isaanii kan dhabanii fi gargaarsa mootummaaf kan galmaa’anidha.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Akka tilmaama Baankii Dhiiheessaa Federaalaa St. Liwuuz’tti weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa namoota miiliyoona 47 hojiin ala gochuu danda’a akkasumas hoji dhabdummaan %32 gahuu danda’a. Cufamni hojjattoota godaanoo Hindii miliyoona kudhaniin lakkaa’aman (kanneen hojii guyyaatiin jiraatan) hojiin ala godhe. Akka qorannoon dhaabbata Angas Reyid argatetti namoonni mana keessaa Kanaadaa %44 hojii dhabummaa walfakkaataatu muudate. Ispeenitti hojjattoonni 900,000 lakkaa’aman sababa cufama walakkaa Bitootessaa 2020 tti hojii isaaniii dhaban.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Walakkeessa lammataa Bitootessaatti, hojjettoonni Faransaay miiliyoona 4 faayidaawwan hojii dhabdummaa yeroo gabaabaatiif iyyatan akkasumas hojjettoonni Biriitish miiliyoonni 1 karoora liqaa waliigalaaf iyyatan. Irra caalaan kaampaanoota miiliyoona walakkaa Jarman keessaa hojjettoota isaanii karoorota hojii yeroo gabaabaa Kurzarbeit jedhamee waamamu kan mootummaan gargaarsi godhamuufitti ergan.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Tooftaa yeroof hojii dhaabuu Jarman Faransaayii fi Barliin birattis fudhatamee jira.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Gareen aartii fi haftee aadaa weerarichaan hundeerraa hubaman, sochii dhaabbilee fi dhuunfaa miidhuun – qacaramtootaa fi kanneen of danda’an lameen – guutuu addunyaarratti hube.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Dhaabbileen sektera aartii fi aadaa ergama hambaalee seenaa hawaasaan ga’uu isaanii (yeroo hedduu hawaasaan kan deeggaraman), nagummaa hojjettoota isaanii fi hawaasaa eeguu, fi iddoo danda’ametti immoo artistoota deeggaruu isaanii itti fufuuf yaalaniiru.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Bitootessa 2020 tti, gama addunyaattiifi hammamtaawwan garaagara ta’aniin, muuziyeemonni, manneen kitaabaa, iddoowwan agarsiisa gahumsaa, fi dhaabbiileen aadaa kan biroo yeroo hin murtoofneef agarsiisonni, taateewwan fi agarsiisonni gahumsaa isaanii haqamuun yookaan gara guyyaa biraatti dabarfamuun cufamaniiru.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Akka deebiitti tajaajilawwan filannoo biraadhaan karaa dirreewwan dijitaalaa dhiyeessuuf yaaliiwwan turaniiru. Miidhaa biraan dhiyoo fi saffisaan guddachaa jiru dhukkubichaan dhufe, haqamuu tajaajiloota amantaa, ta’iilee ispoortii gurguddoo fi ta’iilee hawaasaa biroo, kanneen akka feestivaalotaa fi konsertiiwwanii, konfiraansiiwwaan teknoloojii, fi agarsiisa faashiniiti.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Industiriin fiilmiis jeeqama muudatee jira. Torban kadhannaa Room keessatti, kan waqtii kennaa amantii Kiristaanaa, haqamuu Vaatikaan ifoomse.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Dureewwan amantaa hedduun kiristiyaanonni durii sagantaa tuutaa guyyaa dilbataa deemanii hordofuurra mana akka turan gorsaniiru; waldooleen muraasni immoo tajaajiloonni waldaa karaalee raadiyoo, tamsaasa kallattii toora interneetaarraan ykn televzyiiniin wayita dhiyeessan warri kaan immoo waaqeffannaa konkolaataa keessattii kennaa jiru.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Aanaa Hooggansaa Phaaphaasii Kaatolikii Warra Roomaa jala jiru kan Roomaa manneen sagadaafi manneen kadhannaa isaa cufuufi addababa’ii Pheexros qulqulluu (St. Peter) kiristiiyaanota imaltoota hafuuraa duwwaa gochuu waliin, qaamonni amantaa kan biroo tajaajiloota haqaniiru fi mana sagadaa, masjiidota, manneen sagadaa warra yihudootaa, manneen qulqullummaa fi galmoota warri sikii keessatti waaqessan keessatti walitti qabama uummataa daangessaniiru.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Ministeerri Fayyaa Iraan naannolee weerarichaan miidhamanitti Juma’aan haqamuu kan ifoomsee fi manneen sagadaammoo boodarra kan cufaman yommuu ta’u, Saa’udi Arabiyaan immoo imaltoonni amantaa lammiilee alaa akkasumas jiraattonni ishee iddoolee qulqulluu ishee kan ta’an Makkaa fi Mediinaa tti akka hin seenne uggurteetti.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Weerarri addunyaawaa erga Waraana Addunyaa Lammaffaadhaa kalandarii ispoortii akka addunyaatti goolamuu baay’ee guddaa geessiseera.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Ta’iileen ispoortii gurguddoon Shaampiyoonsi Liigii UEFA 2019-20, Pirimiyeer Liigii 2019-20, UEFA Euro 2020, waqtii NBA 2019-20, fi waqtii NHL 2019-20 dabalatee haqamanii ykn yeroo biraaf dabarfamaniiru.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Weerarri kun dhuma Adoolessaa kan jalqabuuf ture karoora Olympiksii ganna 2020 jeeqeera; Koreen Olympiksii Addunyaa ta’iin kun “guyyaa 2020 booda ta’ee garuu ganna 2021 booda hin taanetti akka wayitiin irra deebi’iin ba’u” Bitootessa gaafa 24 beeksisaniiru. Casinos fi waltajjiileen taphaa guutuu addunyaa biroon kan cufamanii fi taphoonni kaartaa kallattiin tamsa’an yeroo biraatti dabarfamaniiru ykn immoo haqamaniiru.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Kun taphattoonni hedduun sarararra akka deeman, weebsaayitiiwwan taphattootaa jiran wajjiin hammi galmee ijaanii dabalaa jira. Industiriin bashannanaas hubamee jira, weellistoonni hedduun imala konsartii isaanii yeroo tursiisaa yookaan haqaa jiraachuu isaaniitiin.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Tiyaatirri gurguddoon kanneen akka Biroodweey guutumatti ittifamanii jiru.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Artistoonni muraasni karaalee ittiin hojiisaanii ittiin qopheessanii fi qoodan akka filannoo baramaa waltajjiirraatti toora interneetaan kan akka konsertii tamsaasa kallattiiniitii ykn artistoonni hojii isaanii kan ittiin hojjetan, raabsanii fi hawaasaan ga’an “festivaalota” web irratti hundaa’an fa’aa argatanariiru.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Toora interneetaa, baayyonni gara qoosaattii fi wantoota hin mirkanoofneen marfamuurran kan ka’e meemonni interneetaa koronaavaayiresiin faayaman lakkoobsaan hedduu ta’an faffaca’aniiru.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Erga weerara COVID-19 tii qoqqooddaan sadarkaa olaanaaan, jibbiinsi lammiilee alaa fi sabummaan namoota Chaayinaa fi gosa Baha Eeshiyaa ta’an, fi namoota naannoowwan Europe rakkoo hamaa keessa turani, Yuunaayitid Isteetsi fi biyyoota biroorraa ta’anirratti argamaa mullachaa jira.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Taatee sodaa, shakkii, fi kophummaan biyyota hedduu keessatti mul’ate, addatti Awurooppaa, Eeshiyaa Bahaa, Ameerikaa Kaabaa, fi naannoo Eeshiyaa-Paasifik.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Gabaasni Gurraandhalaa (yeroo dhukkubsattoonni baay’een ammas Chaayinaatti daangeffaman) miira sanyummaa guutuu Chaayinaatti garee garaagaraa keessatti guutuu Chaayinaatti vaayirasii barbaacha yookaan waan isaan akka adabbiitti barbaadan.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Biyyoonni Afrikaa tokko tokko babal’achuu isaa akka miira farra-Chaayinaatti ilaalan.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Jiraattonni Wuhaanii fi Hubei hedduun naannoo isaaniitiin miidhaan irra gahuu gabaafame.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Gama sararaatiinii fi sararaan alaatiin gargaarsi ummata Chaayinaatiif godhamee ture, akkasumas gara warreen naannoo vaayirasichaan rukutaman keessa jiraniitti.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Weerarichi gara biyyoota ho’aatti darbuu isaa hordofee, namoonni xaaliyaaniirraa ta’an, biyya Europe jalqabaa weera COVID-19 cimaasaa argitee, shakkii fi jibba lammiilee alaarra ga’uuf saaxilamuu danda’anii turan. Lammiileen biyyoota Maaleeshiyaa, Niw Zilaandi, Siingaapoor, fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa dabalatuu, dhukkubicha dhaabuuf jecha namoonni Chaayinaa biyya isaanii akka hin seenne dhiibbaa geessisuuf mallattoo walitti qabaa turan.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: Jaappaan keessatti, haashtaagiin #ChaayinoonniGaraJaappaanAkkaHinDhufne jedhu Twitter irra naanna’aa ture.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Ummanni Chaayinaa fi Eeshiyaanonni biroo Yuunaayitid Kiingidam keessa jiranii fi Yuunaayitid Isteet dabaluu sadarkaa hubaatii sanyii gabaasan, akkasumas addatti miidhamuu.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Pireezidaantiin U.S. Doonaald Traamp vaayirasii koroonaa "vaayirasii warra Chaayinaatti" jedhanii waan akeekaniif qeequmsi irra gaheera, jecha warra qeeqaniin akka nama sanyiin nama qooduuttiifi farra-warra Chaayinaa ta’uutti tilmaama keessa galu.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Finciltoonni Yuukireen Konkolaataa Yuukireenotaa fi lammiilee biyya alaa iddoo balaa irra fudhatamanii Wuhaan irraa gara Noovi Saanziyaar imalan qabate haleelan.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Barattoonni Kaaba Baha Hindii irraa dhufan, kanneen Chaayinaa wajjiin daangaa qooddatanii, fi magaalota gurguddoo Hindiitti baratan weerara vaayirasii koroonaatiin walqabatee hubaatii akka keessummeessan gabaafame.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Beengaal dhihaatti Pirezidaantii Paartii Bharatiya Janata kan ta’an Diiilip Ghosh akka himanitti Chaayinoonni uumama balleessan “kanaaf rabbi haloo isaanitti bahaa jira.”

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Yaadonni sun booda waajjira qonsiilaa warra Chaayinaa Kolkaataa keessaan balaaleeffatamaniiru, "kan dogoggorame" jedhanii waamuun. Chaayinaa keessatti, jibbi lammiilee biyya alaa (xenophobia) fi sanyii biraa jibbuun jiraattoota lammiilee Chaayinaa hin taane irratti weerara akka addunyaa sanaan o’ifameera, namoonni biyya alaa "kosii alaa" jedhamanii ibsamuun fi "gatamuuf" kaayyeffatamuu waliin.

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Barruuleen kafaltii haguuggii vaayirasii koroonaa hunda yookaan muraasa isaaniitiif isaan haqan.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Maxxansitoonni saayinsawaa hedduun waraqaawwan saayinsawaa ta’an kan jalqabbii gahiinsa banaa argamu waliin walqabatan hojjetan.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Saayintistoonni muraasni bu’aawwan qorannoo isaanii ariitiin serveroota piriiprinti akka ‘bioRxiv’ irratti qooduu filatani.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Dhukkuba daddarbaa mul’achuu jalqabe – dhibeewwan daddarboon paatoojiinii jalqabaa, haala tatamsa’inaa yookaan hamma weeraraa isaatiin yeroo hunda haaraadha

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Giloobaalaayizeeshinii fi dhukkuba – Ibsa waliigalaa giloobaalaayizeeshinii fi daddarbuu dhukkubaa

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Tarreeffama weerarawwan naannoo fi addunyaaa guutuu – Tarreeffama hamma du’aatii dhibee huboo irran ka’anii

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Hojii kontiroobandii bineensa bosonaafi dhukkuboota bineensota lafee dugdaa qaban irraa namatti darban – Balaawwan fayyaa daldala bineensa bosonaa bakka biraatii fidamee madaqfame waliin walqabatan

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Qorannoon Laaboraatoorii dhukkuba hargansuu vaayirasii koroonaa 2019 (COVID-19) fi SARS-CoV-2 tooftaawwan vaayirasiin akka jiru adda baasuufi sanneen farra qaama alagaa dhibee irraa of-ittisuuf oomishaman kan gargar baasan of keessatti hammata.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Argamuun vaayirasoota eddattoowwan keessaa RT-PCR’n mirkanaa’e, kan vaayirasii koroonaa’ RNA adda baasu.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Qorannichi murtaa'aa fi RNA kan vaayirasii SARS-Cov-2 adda baasuu qofaaf kan saxaxamedha.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Wantichi dhukkuba baay’ee dhiyoo fi si’aawaa ta’e mirkaneessuuf oola.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Adda baasuun farra qaama alagaa (serology) qorannoofi to’annoo uummataa lachuuf fayyadamamuu danda’a.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Qorannoowwan farra qaama alagaa namoonni meeqa akka dhukkubichaan qabaman agarsiisa, sanneen gabaasuuf mallattoon isaanii baay’ee gadi aanaa yookaan mallattoo hin agarsiisne dabalatee.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Hammamtaan du’aa kan dhukkubichaa inni sirriifi sadarkaan madiinummaa hawaasi uummata keessaa tokko dhibee ta’een qabamee gaafa fayyu horatu firiiwwan qorannoo kanaa irraa murtaa’uu danda’a.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Sababa qorannoo murtaa’aaf, akka Bitootessa 2020 tti biyyoonni kamiyyuu tamsa’ina vaayirasii uummata isaanii keessaa irratti deetaa amansiisaa hin qaban turan.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Bitootessa 23 tti biyyi uummata isii keessaa dhibbeentaa 3 qoratte hin turre, kanaaf biyyoota addunyaa keessatti hanga ammaatti qorannoon meeqa akka adeemsifame ilaalchisee garaa garummaa guddaatu jira.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Jijjiiramuun kun hammamtaa du’aa dhimma gabaafamee haala guddaan miidhuu danda'a, kan biyyoota muraasa keessatti kan tilmaamame ol guddaa ta'uu danda'u.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Mala eenzaayimiin walitti dhufu wanta inni agarsiisu yeroo inni raawwachaa jirutti kallattii isaa duubatti deebisanii ilaaluudhaan (rRT-PCR) qorannoon kan raawwatamuu danda’u tooftaalee garaa garaa fayyadamuudhaan saamuuda ujummoo qilleensaa keessaa fuudhuudhaani, kun immoo jiidha harsasseedhaa hanga laagaatti jiru yookaan saamuuda hancufaa fuudhuu dabalata.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Firiiwwan waliigalaan sa’aatiiwwan xiqqoo hanga guyyoota 2 gidduutti ni argamu.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Qorannoon RT-PCR qoonqoo keessaa eeddattoo waan akka jirbiin fuudhamu irratti adeemsifame torban jalqabaa dhukkubichaa keessatti qofaa amansiisaadha.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Yeroon booda vaayirasichi sombawwan keessatti baay’achuu itti fufaa qoonqoo keessaa baduu danda’a

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Namoota hubaman kan torbee lammaffaa keessatti qoratamaniif, filmaataan meeshaan eddattoo karaa qilleensa gadi aanaa irraa suction catheter’n yookaan gorora (sputum) irraa fudhachuun ni danda'ama.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Qorannoowwan PCR jalqabaa keessaa tokko Amajji 2020 tti Charité, Berliin keessatti dagaagfame walnyaatinsa transcription polymerase chain yeroo qabatamaa (rRT-PCR) fayyadamuun, akkasumas Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaatiin (WHO) bu’uura raaabsamuu meeshaalee 250,000 kaa’e.

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: Ingiliziinis Amajji 23, 2020 tti qorannoo dagaagsiteetti. Kaampaaniin Kooriyaa Kibbaa Kogenebiotech sadarkaa kilinikaawaa, meeshaa SARS-CoV-2 adda baasu PCR irratti hundaa’e (Vaayirasii koroonaa PowerChek) Amajji 28, 2020 tti dagaagse.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Jiiniin "E" vaayirasii koroonaa beettaa hundumaan kan qoodame fakkata, fi jiiniin RdRp kan argamu SARS-CoV2 qofa keessatti. Chaayinaa keessatti, Gareen BGI kubbaaniyyaa yeroo jalqabaaf eeyyama fayyadaminsa balaa tasaa PCR irratti kan hundaa'e meeshaa SARS-CoV-2 adda baasu kan fudhatan keessaa tokko turan. Yunaayitid Isteets keessatti, Wiirtuun too'annoo fi Ittisa dhibee (CDC) Di'aagnoostik Paanelii 2019- vayirasii Koroonaa Noovel (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR isaa laaboraatoorii fayyaa uummataatti karaa Qabeenya Ri'eejantii Addunyaa (International Reagent Resource) raabsaa jira.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Qorannoowwan jenetikii sadan keessaa inni tokko kan meeshaalee qorannoo fooyya’a durii keessaa sababa waanta jijjiirama keemikaalaa fidu(reagent) hin hojjenneen firiiwwan murtaawoo hin taane, akkasumas haala rakkisaa CDC Atlaantaa tti fide; kun guutummaa Gurraandhala 2020 tti guyyaatti eddattoowwan milkaa’oo giddu galaan 100 gadii akka adeemsifaman godhe.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Qorannoowwan qaamota lama fayyadamuun taasifaman dhugoomni isaanii hanga Amajji 28,2020tti hin murtoofne, akkasumas, hanga yeroo sanaatti laaboraatooriin mootummaafi naannoowwanii yaalii jalqabuun hin hayyamamneef ture.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Qorannochi Ajaja Ittifayyadama Yeroo Hatattamaa (EUA) jalatti Bulchiinsa Nyaataafi Qorichaatiin mirkaneeffameera. Laabiraatooriiwwan daldalaa U.S Bitootessa 2020 gara jalqabaa keessa qorannoo eegalan.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 5, 2020 tti LabCorp argama akka biyyoolessaa qorannoo COVID-19 RT-PCR irratti hundaa'e beeksiise.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Bitootessa 9, 2020 tti haala walfakkaataan Quest Diagnostics yaalii COVID-19 kan uummata hunda qaqqabu hojjeteera.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Daangeffamni baay’inaa hin beeksifamne; sassaabbiin eddattoo fi hojiin isaa akka ulaagaalee CDC tti adeemsifamuu qaba.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: Raashaa keessatti, qorannoon COVID-19 Wiirtuu Qorannoo Mootummaa kan Vaayirooloojii fi Baayooteeknooloojii ‘VECTOR’ n hojjetamee oomishame.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Gurraandhala 11, 2020 tti qorannichi Tajaajila Federaalaa To’annoo Kunuunsa Fayyaa keessaaf (Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare) dhaan galmaa’e. Bitootessa 12, 2020 tti, gaafa Bitootessa 13 2020, Roche Diagnostics qabiyyee ol’aanaan qorannoo COVID-19 sa’aatiiwwan 3.5 gidduutti adeemsifamuu danda’uun Mirkaneessa FDA fudhate, kanaaf maashiniin tokko tilmaamaan qorannoowwan 4,128 dheerina yeroo sa’aatiiwwan 24 akka hojjetu gochuun.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Bitootessa 19, 2020, Bulchiinsi Nyaataafi Qorichaa (FDA)n qorannoo sistamii m2000 ‘Abbott’iif Laabiraatooriiwwan ‘Abbott’itti ajaja fayyadama attattamaa (EUA) dabarse; FDAn kanaan dura ajajuma walfakkaatu ‘Hologic, LabCorp, fi Thermo Fisher Scientific’ tti dabarsee ture.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: Bitootessa 21, 2020 irratti, haaluma wafakkataan Cepheid FDA irraa EUA fudhate qorannoo naannoo daqiiqaa 45 fudhatuuf.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA’n PCR irra qorannoo tekinolojii isothermal nucleic acid amplification fayyadamu mirkaneesse.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Erga kun teempireechara jijjiiramaa maroo walitti fufaa hin barbaannee malli kun firii positiivii xiqqeenyaan daqiiqaawwan shan fi firii nagatiivii daqiiqaawwan 13 keessatti kenna.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Yeroo ammaa U.S. keessa maashinootni kun naannoo 18,000 tu jiru fi Abbott guyyaatti qorannoo 50,000 kennuuf oomisha isaa ol kaasuuf tilmaama. Yaaliin farra qaama alagaa horaa-baaqqee fayyadamu kan addatti pirootiinii nuukle'ookaapsiid (N protein) irratti maxxanu kan vaayirasii koroonaa noovel Taayiwaan keessatti hojjetamaa jira, abdiidhaan akkuma qorannoo saffisaa infiluweenzaa daqiiqaa 15 hanga 20tti firii dhiheessuu danda'a.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Keeddeebiin barreeffama Bitootessa 2020 "raajiin laphee sadarkaawwan duraatti gatii qorannaa xiqqaa qaba, argannoowwan CT immoo [computed tomography] jalqabuu mallattoon dura jiraachuu malu" jechuun guduunfe.

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: CT irratti amallonni addaa kan dabalatan bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities raabsa fiixee, danaa walqixxee kan hin qabnee fi duubaan jiru waliin.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: Akka dhukkubichi mul’achaa deemeen ‘pilooraa’n guddachuu, sombi cocorree ta’uufi jabaachuutu uumama.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Qu’annoon Wuhaan keessatti madda tuqaa weerara yeroo ammaatti PCR CT waliin waldorgomsiisu CT’n PCR caalaa baay’ee miira qabeessa akka ta’e dhiyeessa, ta’us adda baasuun isaa gadi anaadha, amala boci isaa michiiwwan sombaa fi adeemsota dhibeewwan kan biroo waliin wal irra bu’uu agarsiisu waliin.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 2020 tti, Koolleejjiin Raadiyooloojii Ameerikaa (American College of Radiology) "calaluuf yookaan qorannoo sarara jalqabaa irratti COVID-19 qorachuuf CT’n fayyadamamuu akka hinqabne" gorsa. Akka Bitootessa 2020 tti, CDC’n calallii jalqabaatiif PCR eera.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Kutaan deebii madiinummaa qaamaa dhukkubaan hubamuu oomisha farra qaama alagaati IgM fi IgG dabalateeti.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Kunniin hubamuu namootaa erga mallattoon mul’achuu jalqabee guyyoota 7 yookaan caalaa irraa kaasee adda baasuuf, madiinummaa murteessuuf, fi to’annoo uummataa keessatti fayyadamamu. Qorannoowwan laaboraatoriiwwan giddu galaatti (CLT) yookaan point-of-care testing (PoCT) ttin adeemsifamuu danda’u.

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Sirnooti ofumaan qorannoo ol’aanaa gaggeessan laaboraatooriiwwan kilinikaawaa baay’ee keessatti argaman qorannoo kana hojjechuu ni danda'u garuu argami isaanii saffisa oomisha sirna tokkoon tokkoo isaanii irratti hundaa'a.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: CLT’f eddattoon baaqqee dhiiga fiixee qaamaa irra jiruu yeroo baay’ee fayyadamama, eddattoowwan karooraan funaanaman deebii madiinummaa qaamaa hordofuuf fayyadamamuu danda’u.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: PoCT dhaaf saamuudni dhiigaa tokkittiin yeroo hedduu gogaa uruudhaan fuudhama.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Adeemsa PCR'tiin addatti madaalliidhaan dura adeemsi sakkatta'iinsaa hin barbaachisu. Bitootessa 26, 2020, FDA’n dhaabbata 29 kan akka barbaadamutti ejensichatti beeksisan adda baaseera akkasumas yaalii farra qaama alagaa isaanii raabsuu danda'anii jiru.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: Akka Ebla 7, 2020 tti, fayyadama mirgeessuu balaa tasaa jalatti qorannoo tokko qofaatu FDA’n mirkanaa’e. Dhuma Bitootessa 2020 tti, Qorannoon Laaboraatoorii Wal’aansaa Euroimmum (Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics) fi Qorannoon Epitope (Epitope Diagnostics) meeshaalee qorannoo isaaniif mirkaneessa warra Awurooppaa argatan, kan eddattoowwan dhiigaa keessatti farra qaama alagaa IgG fi IgA argachuu danda’u.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: Dandeettiin qorachuu isaa sa’aatii tokko keessatti eddattoowwan baay’ee dhibbaan lakkaa’amaniidha kanaaf qorannoo PCR vaayirasii RNA barame irra baay’ee saffisaadha.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: Farroonni qaama alagaa yeroo baay’ee dhukkubichaan hubamuu guyyoota 14’n booda ni argamu. Jalqaba Eblaatti, UK’n tokkoon meeshaalee qorannoo farra qaama alagaa inni bite kamiyyuu haala quubsaan fayyadamuuf gaarii hin turre.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: Hoong Koong sirna ittiin dhukkubsattoonni shakkaman ittiin mana oolan qindeessite, "dippartimantiin balaa tasaa ujummoo yaalii ittiin eddattoo fuudhan (specimen tube) dhukkubsatichatti ni kennu", isaan isa keessatti tufu, deebisanii erguun yeroo booda firii qorannoo argatu. Biriteen NHS sirna dhimmoota shakkaman manatti ittiin qorattu yaalaa akka jirtu beeksifte, kan dhukkubsataan yoo hospitaala dhufe namoota biroo faaluu yookaan ambulaansiin fayyadamameera yoo ta’e isa qulqulleessu hambisu. Dhimmoota COVID-19’f shakkamaniif qorannoo konkolaataan utuu darbanii yaalamuu (drive-through testing) keessatti, ogeessi kunuunsa fayyaa of-eeggannoo sirriin eddattoo fuudha.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: Wiirtuuwwan konkolaataa keessatti yaaluu Kooriyaa Kibbaa qorannoo saffisaa, qorannoo guddaa kana biyya kamiiyyuu caalaa akka gootu dandeessiseera. Jarman keessatti, Ogeessonni Fayyaa Waldaa Inshuraansii Fayyaa akka Biyyoolessaa Seera qabeessa ta’ee (National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians) Bitootessa 2, inni guyyaatti dandeettii qorannoowwan naannoo 12,000 qindaa’ina iddoo dhukkubsataan ofiin keessa deemuu danda’u keessatti akka qabuufi torbee isa duraatti 10.700 qoratamaniiru jedhan.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: Yeroo qorannichi ogeessa fayyaan ajajamu gatiin isaa inshuraansii fayyaatiin deeggarama.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Akka Pireezidaantii Dhaabbata Robert Koch (Robert Koch Institute) tti, Jarman torbanitti qorannoowwan 160,000’f humna waliigalaa qabdi.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: Bitootessa 19 jalqabee magaalota gurguddoo heedduu keessatti qorannoowwan namoota konkolaataan gara biyyaa seenanii dhi'aatanii turan.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 26, 2020 tti lakkoofsi waliigalaa qorannoo Jarmanii keessatti godhame hin beekamu, sababni isaas firiiwwan pozitivii ta'an qofaatu gabaafaman.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: Kaaleendara torbee 12/2020 irratti akka qorannoon laaboraatoorii isa duraa mul’isetti waliigalatti yoo xinnaate eddattoowwan 483,295 torbee 12/2020 dabalatee qoratamaniiru akkasumas eddattoowwan 33,491 (6.9%) SARS-CoV-2 irraa positivii ta'uu mul’isaniiru. Israa'eel keessatti qorattooni hospitaala Technion fi Rambam haala walfakkaatuun mala eddattoowwan dhukkubsattoota 64 altokkotti ittiin qoratan dagaagsaniiru fi qorataniiru, eddattoowwan walitti makuun fi eddattoowwan walitti makaman yoo positivii ta’an qorannoo dabalataa gaggeessuun. Wuhaan keessatti laaboraatooriin balaa tasaa adda baasu maqaan isaa "Huo-Yan" (Afaan chaayinaatiin 火眼, ykn Ingiliffaan "Fire Eye") iskuuwer meetirii 2000 irratti argamu Gurraandhala 5, 2020 BGI’n baname, kan guyyaatti eddattoowwan 10,000 caalaan gaggeessuu danda'u.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: Ijaarsichi hundeessaa BGI Wang Jian’n to’atamuu fi guyyoota 5 fudhachuu waliin, osoo dandeettiin qorannoo sarara irratti dhufuu baatee dhimmi moodeeliingii Hubei keessaa 47% olaanaa ta'a ture akkasumas gatiin qofaatti bahuu to’annaa jala galchuu dachaa ta'a ture.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: Laaboraatooriiin Wuhaan battalumatti laaboraatooriiwwan Huo-Yan Sheenzheen, Tianjin, Bejiing, fi Shaangaayi, dimshaashan magaalaawwan Chaayinaa 12 keessaan hordofame.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: Bitootessa 4, 2020tti lakkoofsi qorannoowwan guyyaatti geggeeffamanii 50,000 ture. Maddi banamaan, dizaayinii walxaxaa ‘Origami Assays’n gad dhiifame ‘assays’ 93 qofa fayyadamuudhaan saamuuda dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 lakkoofsi isaanii hanga 1122 baay’atu qorachuu danda’a. Dizaayinoonni walmadaaloon kunniin roobootiiwwan dhangala’aa dhiyeessan utuu hinbaarbbaadin laabiraatoorii xiqqoo keessatti hojjechuu danda’u.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: Bitootessatti, hanqinnii fi ga’aa ta’aa dhabuun hammamtaa waanta jijjiirama keemikaalaa fiduu qorannoo guddaa EU fi UK fi US keessaatiif haala rakkisaa ta’eera.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: Kun barreessitoota muraasa aaloowwan qophii eddattoo kan eddattoowwan 98 °C (208 °F) irratti daqiiqaa 5’niif ho'isuun qorannoo dabalataaf jenoomii RNA gadhiisuu akka aloolan godheera. Bitooteessa 31 irratti Yunaayitid Arab Emireet amma biyyoota kanneen biroo kamiyyuu caalaa uummatoota ishee tokkoon tokkoof qorannoo vaayirasii Koroonaa godhaa akka jirtu, fi uummata hunda waliin ga'uuf sadarkaa qorannoo guddisuuf karaarra jiraachuun ishee beeksifameera.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: Kun karaa walitti makama dandeettii konkolaataan utuu darbanii yaalamuu, akkasumas garee 42 fi BGI irraa laaboraatoorii guddaa hamma baay’ina uummataa bituun (laaboraatoorii balaa tasaa adda baasu "Huo-Yan" kan chaayinaa keessatti argamurratti hundaa’uun).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: Guyyoota 14 keessatti ijaarame, laaboraatoorichi guyyaatti qorannoowwan RT-PCR kumaatamaan lakkaa’aman gaggeessuu danda’a akkasumas iskeelii kanaan Chaayinaan alatti tajaajilaaf qophaa’aa kan ta’e akka addunyaatti isa jalqabaati.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: Qorannoowwan garagaraa kutaawwan odeeffannoo waa’ee sanyii murtaa’aa vaayirasii koroonaa manii godhatan Chaayinaa, Faransaay, Jarman, Hoong Koong, Jaappaan, fi Yunaayitid Isteets keessatti dagaagfaman.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: Dhaabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa meeshaalee ittisaa biyyoonni galii gadi aanaa qaban ofii isaanitiif dhiyeessuu hin dandeenye oomishee erguufiidhaaf, wixinee (ibsa) Jarmanii fudhate.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: Wixineen (Ibsi) Jarmanii Amajji 17, 2020 tti maxxanfame; qajeelfamni Yunaayitid Isteetsiin dagaagfame hamma Amajji 28 tti hin argamne, qorannoowwan U.S.Chaayinaa fi Yunaayitid Isteets keessatti tursiifamaa jiran gara jalqabaa jalqabbichaatti amansiisummaa meeshaawwan qorannoo waliin rakkoo qabu turani, akkasumas biyyoonni kunniiniifi Awustiraaliyaan fedhiifi ogeessota fayyaan yaada kenname guutuuf meeshaalee dhiyeessuu hin dandeenye.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Faallaa isaan, ogeessonni bal’inaan qorannoof argamuun Kooriyaa Kibbaa tamsa’ina vaayirasii koroonaa nooveel hir’isuuf gargaareera jedhu.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: Dandeettiin qorannoo, irra-jireessaan laaboraatoorii damee dhuunfaa keessatti, mootummaa Kooriyaa Kibbaan waggoota dheeraa keessatti ijaaraman.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: Bitootessa 16, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa akka mala isa hunda caaluutti sagantaalee qorannoo guddisuudhaan tatamsa’ina weerara COVID-19 akka xiqqeessaniif waamicha dabarse. Vaayirasichi waan baay’ee tatamsa’eef fedhiin sakatta’amuu baay’ee guddate. Kun immoo qorannoowwan hedduun laabiraatooriiwwan dhuunfaa U.S. keessatti akka walirra tuulaman taasise, dhiyeessiin haxooftuuwwanii fi cheemikaalota qorannoof oolaniis fedhii guddaa godhate.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: Bitootessa 2020 tti Chaayinaan rakkoowwan sirrummaa meeshaawwan qorannaa isaanii keessaa gabaaste.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: Yunaayitid Isteets keessatti, meshaawwan qorannoo CDC’n dagaagfaman “dogoggoroota” qabu turan; mootummichi isa booda danqaa biirokraasii kan qorannoo dhuunfaa dhorkee ture kaaseera. Ispeen meeshaawwan qorannoo faabriikaa Chaayinootaa Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd irraa bitteetti, garuu firiiwwan isaanii sirrii akka hin turre bira geesse.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: Faabriikichi sababiin firiiwwan dogongoraa dadhabina sassaabbii eddattoo yookaan dadhabina haala fayyadama meeshaalee ta’uu ibse.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: Ministriin Ispaanish meeshaalee firiiwwan sirrii hin taane agarsiisan akka balleessu, fi isaaniin meeshaa qorannoo kan biraa Shenzhen Bioeasy’n dhiyaatuun akka bakka buusu dubbate. Meeshaalee qorannoo 80% Cheek Rippaabilik Chaayinaa irraa bitte firii sirrii hin taane kennami. Siloovaakiyaan meeshaalee qorannoo miiliyoona 1.2 Chaayinaa irraa bitte kan sirrii ta’uu dhiisuun isaanii beekame.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: Muummichi Ministeeraa Matovič kunniin Danube tti akka gataman yaada dhiyeessan. Ateş Kara’n Ministeera Fayyaa Turkii meshaalee qorannoo Turkiiin Chaayinaa irra bitte " hamma dogoggoraa guddaa" akka qabaniifi "isaanitti fayyadamanii akka beekne" dubbatan. UK’n meeshaalee qorannoo miiliyoona 3.5 Chaayinaa irraa bitte garuu jalqaba Ebla 2020 tti kunniin faayidaa kennuu kan hin dandeenye ta’uu beeksisan.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: Qorannoo, qofaatti baafamuu namoota qoratamanii pozitiivii ta’aniin fi warreen namoonni SARS-CoV-2 waliin pozitiivii ta’an duukaa qunnamtii qaban faana dhahuu hordofame, firii pozitiivii ta’e agarsiisan.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: Qorattoonni magaalaa Xaaliyaanii Vo, bakka itti yeroo jalqabaa Xaaliyaanii keessaa namni COVID-19 dhaan du’e keessaa hojjetaa jiran uummata magaalichaa 3,400 ta’an guutummaa isaaniitiif guyyoota kudhan wal irraa fageessanii marsaa lamaaf qoratan.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: Namoota vaayirasichi irratti argame keessaa walakkaan isaanii mallattoo hin agarsiisne, kanneen irratti argame hundi immoo adda baafamanii tursiifaman.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: Daangeffamuu imala gara gartuu namoota waliin jiraatanii waliin, kun guutummaatti dhukkubootaan hubamuu haaraa dhabamsiiseera.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: Faana bu'uu walqunnamtii cimaa, daangeffamoota imala keessoo, qorannoo, fi qofaatti of-baasuu waliin, weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa 2020 Siingaapoor keessatti biyyoota guddatan biroo irra garmalee suuta deeme, garuu daangeffama garmalee kanneen akka dirqiin cufamuu manneen nyaataa fi dhugaatii akkasumas hundeeffama qeenxabootaa malee.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: Taateewwan hedduun haqamaniiru, akkasumas Singaapoor jiraattota akka isaan mana turan Bitootessa 28 tti gorsuu jalqabdeetti, garuu manneen barnootaa boqonnaa ayyaanaa Bitootessa 23’n booda deebi’anii banamaniiru.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: Biyyoonni baay’ee kan biroon akkasumas weeraricha humnaan namoota faana dhahuu, daangeffama imalaa keessoo, qorannoo, akkasumas qofaatti baasuun to’atan, garuu uggura xiqqoo humna hin qabneen, kan akka Iceland fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: Qorannoon istaatistikii biyyoonni baay’ee qoratan, lakkoofsa du’aan gaafa walbira qabamu, hammamtaawwan du’aa baay’ee gadi aanaa akka qaban argate, tarii sababa biyyoonni kunniin sanneen mallattoo salphaa yookaan mallattoo hin qabne caalmaatti adda baasuu danda’aniifi.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: WHO’n biyyoonni humna qorannoo gaggeessuu hin qabneefi laaboraatooriiwwan biyyoolessaa muxannoo COVID-19 murtaa’e qaban eddattoowwan COVID-19 positiivota isaanii jalqabaa shaniifi negatiivii jalqabaa kudhan madda laaboraatoorii WHO 16’n keessaa tokkotti mirkaneessaaf akka ergan eera.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: Laabiraatooriiwwan rageeffaman 16 keessaa 7 Eeshiyaa keessatti, 5 Awurooppaa keessatti, 2 afriikaa keessatti, 1 Ameerikaa Kaabaa keessatti, 1 immoo Awustiraaliyaa keessatti argamu.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: Chaartii armaan gadii keessatti, tarjaan “Positive as % of tests” jedhu imaammata qorannoo biyya sanaan murtaa'a.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: Biyyi namoota hospitaala ciisan qofaa qorattu biyya lammiiwwan ishee hunda qorattu irra % qorannoowwanii positiivii ol’aanaa qabaatti, mallattoowwan kan agarsiisanis kan hin agarsiifnes yoo ta’e, wantoonni kan biroon walqixa ta’uun.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: Harka dhiqachuun (yookaan dhiqannaan harkaa), kan qulqullina harkaa jedhamuun beekamu, biyyee, dibata, oorgaanizimoota xixiqqoo yookaan wantoota hinbarbaachisne biroo ofirraa baasuuf jecha gocha harka ofii qulqulleessuuti.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: Harka keenya guyyaatti yeroo murteessaa ta’an hunda dhiqachuun dhukkuboota daddarboo heddu hir’isa. Fakkeenyaaf dhukkuboota xuraawaa qaama keessa bahuun daddarban kanneen akka garaa kaasaa fi koleeraa ittisa.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: Namoonni dhukkuboota hargansuu miidhan kanneen akka infuluweenzaa fa’aan qabamuu danda’u, fakkeenyaaf, ija, funyaanii fi afaan isaanii tuttuquun dura harka isaanii hin dhiqanne taanaan.

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Yeroon murteessoon guyyaatti harka keenya saamunaan yeroo shan itti dhiqachuu qabnu: xuraawaa baafachuu keenyaan duraa fi booda, erga daa’ima qulqulleessineen booda, daa’imaaf nyaata kennuun dura, yaada qopheessuun duraa fi booda akkasumas nyaachuun dura yookan foon dheedhii, qurxummii fi handaaqqoo erga xuxxuqneen booda.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: Bishaaniifi saamuunaan hinjiru yoo ta’e, daaraadhaan harka dhiqachuun ni danda’ama. Dhabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa harka dhiqannaa gorsa:

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: Nyaata qopheessuun dura, yeroo nyaata qopheessinuu fi erga nyaata qopheessineen booda.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: Dhukkubsataa kunuunsuu keenyaan duraa fi booda.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: Erga daa’ima mana fincaanii fayyadamte dhiqnee yookaan daayiparii jijjiirrefin booda.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Erga funyaankee haguugdee, qufa’uu ykn haxxiffachuu.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: Beelada, nyaata beeladaa, yookaan boolii beeladaa tuttuquudhaan booda.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: Qulqullinni harkaa fayyaa akka qulqullina shaakala tajaajila fayyaa kennuutti fudhatama.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: Daawaa kedduudhaan yookaan kunuunsa fayyaatiin dura harka dhiqachuun tatamsa’ina dhukkubichaa ittisuu yookaan xiqqeessuu danda’a.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: Faayidaan fayyaa harka dhiqannaa inni guddaan harka wantoota dhibee fidanii (baakteeriyaa, vaayirasii, yookaan orgaanizimiiwwan xixiqqoo biroo warra dhibee fiduu danda’an) fi keemikaalota miidhaa yookaan dhukkuba namatti fidan irraa qulqulleessuudha.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: Kun namoota iddoo nyaataa yookaan naannawa fayyaa hojjataniif baay’ee murteessadha, hawaasa maraafis akkasuma barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: Harka dhiqachuun bu’aa fayyaa kanneen akka babal’ina infuluweenzaa, vaayirasii koroonaa fi dhukkuboota daddarboo biroo hir’isuu; akkasumas wantoota garaa kaasaa fidan ittisuu fi wantoota dhibee qaamota hargansuu fidan ittisuuf fayyada.

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: Akkasumas tajaajila dahumsaa manatti erguudhaan du’a daa’immanii hir’isuu.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: Qo’annoon bara 2013 akka agarsiisutti yeroo yerootti harka dhiqachuun ijoollee waggaa shanii gadii dheerini isaanii akka dabalu gargaarsa xiqqoo ni kenna.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: Biyyoota guddataa jiran keessatti saffisi du’a daa’immanii kan dhukkuba hafuraan darbuufi dhukkuboota garaa kaasaa wajjin walqabatan jijjiirraa amalaa salphaa, kan akka harka saamuunaadhaan dhiqachuu fiduudhaan hir’achuu danda’a.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: Gochi salphaan kun dandeettii ajjeesuu dhibeewwan kanaa 50% dhaan gadi buusuu danda’u.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: Dhiibbaan harka dhiqachuu jajjabeessu dhibee garaa kaasaa harka sadiin hir’isuu danda’a, kun immoo naannoo lafa dakeetti bishaan qulqulluu dhiheessuun kan walmadaaluudha.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: Marsaan garaa kaasaa %48n hir’isuun harka saamuunaadhaan dhiqachuu waliin hidhata qabaachuu danda’a. Ittisa garaa kaasaatii fi dhukkuba hafuura baafannaa hamaa ta’eef (ARI) malli tokkochi baay’ee bu’a-qabeessaa fi baasii cimaa hingaafanne, akka amala utuu ofirratti hinbeekin manatti, mana barnootaa keessattii, akkasumas hawaasota addunyaa keessatti raawwatamu harka saamuunaadhaan dhiqachuudha.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: Niimooniyaan, ARI olaanaan, waggaatti tilmaamaan daa’imman miliyoona 1.8 fudhachuun du’a daa’imman waggaa shanii gadiitiif sababa tokkoffaadha.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: Garaa kaasaa fi daranyoon sombaa wal ta’anii waggaatti daa’imman naannoo miliyoona 3.5 ta’an galaafatu.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: Akka UNICEF’tti mana fincaanii boodaa fi nyaata dura harka saamunaan dhiqachuun talaallii fi yaala kamuu caalaa barbaachisaadha. Namoota garaa kaasaan du’an walakkaanii fi namoota rakkoo qaamota hargansuutiin walqabatee du’an tokko afraffaan hir’isa.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: Qulqullinni harkaa yeroo hunda qulqullina bishaanii, fi sagantaa qulqullina biro wajjiin walqabata.

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: Harka dhiqachuun baakteeriyaa dhukkuba gogaa, isa tuttuqaa kallattiitiin darbu illee ni ittisa.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: Miidhaan harka dhiqachuu inni xiqqaan, irra deddeebiidhaan harka dhiqachuun gogaa waan gogsuuf gogaan miidhamuu danda’a.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: Qorannoon Danish bara 2012 akka argatetti hanga barbaachisuu ol harka dhiqachuun midhaa gogaa (itchy) kan hand eczema yookaan hand dermatitis jedhamuun beekamu nama qabsiisuu, keessattu hojjattoota fayyaa miidhuu danda’a.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: Akka malee ammaa amma harka dhiqachuun akka mallattoo dhibee gar malee waa jaallachuufi wanta san obsuu dadhabuutti (OCD) illee ni lakkaa’ama.

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Harka saamunaan dhiqachuu yeroo guyyaa daddarbaa dhukkubaa ittisuuf yeroowwan murteessaa shantu jira: erga kutaa qaama dhiqannaa fayyadamneen booda (erga fincaannee fi xuraawaa baafanneen booda), erga daa’ima qulqulleessineen booda, osoo daa’imaaf nyaata hin kenning dura, nyaachuun duraa fi erga nyaata qopheessuu duraa fi booda yookaan erga foon dheedhii, qurxummii yookaan handaaqqoo tutuqneen booda harka keenya saamunaan dhiqachuu qabna.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: Gama biraatiin madaa muruu duraa fi booda; erga haxxifannee, qufaanee fi funyaan keenya tuttuqneen boodas; bobbaa bineensotaa kamuu erga tuqnee booda yookaan bineensota wajjiin wal tuttuqneen booda, iddoo xuraawaan itti gatamu erga tutuqneen booda harka keenya haala gaariin dhiqachuun daddarba dhibee hir’isa.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: Biyyoota hedduu keessatti, saamuunaadhaan harka dhiqachuun hammi isaa gad aanaadha.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
